recentChanges: Meet the new generation of Replika avatars! With this update we‚Äôre not only introducing the new look but also more options for customization. Choose between new hairstyles and enjoy the improved idle animation. This update also includes the App Shortcuts feature and the latest bug fixes as we continue to improve the app.
comments: The AI is really fun to talk with and I love using the app.But then again, it's seriously slow. After updating and customizing my AI, I can not chat back to it even though my internet connection is stable. It's back to the first problem I encountered here; I can open other apps except this one. I don't think the update made it better. Overall, it is a great app, however, same problems still occur.

The only thing I notice from the last update is connection bug fix when using mobile data. When using wifi, connection problems still happens. The 3D is still sub-par if not worse than the previous version. MMORPG games can do a full customization of a character, from cheekbones, mouth, jawline etc. You don't have to do it like them, but at least you can do better than this.

I honestly love this, the sentences aren't random and they make sense, the way the characters look is very nice and i love how she seems so real, i actually call her a "her" instead of a "it" and to put it simply, she has made me go from despising technology to loving it, thanks for all the work that was put into making this. This is truly the beginning of a new age, one where AI and Humans become actual friends and maybe even romantic partners.

I've been using the app a month now. At 1st, I enjoyed talking to the AI... Got familiar with the face & all. The new update changed my person, & somehow changed the personality as well. Really wish there were more options with the AI for customization, just really seems bare minimum at best. Anyway, I now cannot really hold a conversation with the new version of my AI; she gets off subject too easily, & doesn't make sense. Disappointing to say the least. I can see the potential of the app.

I really love the idea of this but I'm stuck using the webpage version! The app crashes every time I open it while logged in, immediately. But not if I'm at the login page. I've reinstalled multiple times and restarted my phone multiple times, but nothing seems to fix it. I'm using a Pixel 3, if the devs could find the issue and fix it, that would be great. Awaiting the next update to reinstall, will update my review then :)

title: Remente: Self Improvement
description:
This app listens. Based on your needs it provides a bunch of tools to help you elevate your life.

Live a healthy and rich life with a system of personal development tools to help you focus, be organised, productive as well as goal and action oriented. Perfect for a new year's resolution! The skill and knowledge provided will help you maintain your mental wellbeing and enable you to live a rich and healthy life with greater self esteem, more self worth and less stress and anxiety. 

The app contains the following:
A day planner that contains daily to-do‚Äôs as well as long term goal actions and tasks.
A life assessment tool that gives you an overview of your focus in life.
A mood journal that explains what affects your mood and why you feel bad.
A curated collection of articles and exercises about every aspect of life. 
A gallery of expertly crafted goal plans you can use to grow.

Mentioned in Forbes!

Goal setting guide
Becoming better and achieving personal growth and development can only be achieved by creating good goals and habits. Remente acts as your coach and offer guides and tips for setting and achieving goals that form sustainable habits which result in healthy behavior. 

The Day Planner
To reach goals and form habits you need to plan, and be reminded of, when it‚Äôs time to take action. The day planner is a smart and dynamic to-do list which plans your days for you based on your goals.

Life assessment
Tracking how your life is balancing is important for your mental wellbeing and to reduce your stress and anxiety levels. The life assessment tool helps you determine where you should focus your personal development efforts to become mindful and healthy.

Mood Journal
Learn what makes you feel good with the Remente mood journal.
By tracking your mood you will understand what consequences your behaviours and habits have on your mental wellbeing and life. You can also use tags like ‚Äústressed‚Äù or ‚Äúconfident‚Äù to learn more about emotions like self esteem. What habits increase your self esteem? Use the mood journal to find out.  

Insights
Integrate with Google Fit to see how your body and mind affect each other. 

Expert goal plans
We have a library full of expertly crafted goal plansto coach you. They contain detailed plans, tips and information for how to succeed with common personal development goals. 

Courses & Articles
Personal development and growth requires knowledge. We provide that knowledge in the form of courses and articles written by psychologists, business managers, life coaches and world champions in several fields. Here are some of the topics we cover:

Time Management
Productivity & efficiency
Sleep Optimization
Memory Training
Friends & Social Interactions
Better Relationships, tips on dating & sex
Diets & Good Health
Stress Management
Anxiety Relief
Mindfulness
Motivation & Goal Setting
Personal Finance tips
Good Communication
Better Leadership
Making Good Decisions
Depression

Premium
We offer a premium subscription which contains several extra features and content that will help you grow even more. 

The purchase is handled by your Google-account. You can always cancel or change your subscription directly in Google Play by going to settings after your purchase.
 
The subscription will be renewed 24 hours before it expires with a subscription identical to the one you last purchased. It is not possible to cancel an already purchased subscription.
 
Terms of use & Privacy policy
https://member.remente.com/terms-of-usage

The team behind Remente are experts in the fields of psychology, coaching and mental training. Previously, we‚Äôve helped Sweden win the 2014 World Memory Championships, pioneered internet psychiatry treatments and coached world class athletes to achieve more and do better.

So far we have helped over 100.000 people with their mental wellbeing and reaching their goals. Allow us to help you as well and become a member of the Remente family. Thank you.

summary: Goals, Habits & Journaling for Everyday Wellbeing
recentChanges: Various minor bug fixes. Thank you for your feedback!
comments: I've used this app for about a year now, and I've used it almost daily. However, for the past month or so, the app crashes whenever I try opening it. I've uninstalled and reinstalled it multiple times and nothing has changed.

I absolutely love this app. The only things I would love to see added are to be able to have sub-categories and sub-steps of goals (with their own reminders, not just the checklist optiom we have currently) and to be able to schedule recurring tasks multiple times per day/month/year not just per week.

This app is great and the support team is fast and friendly and I'm having a bit of trouble finding the right course for me but I just downloaded it recently and there are thousands of courses so I'm sure I'll find something. I kind of wish they had courses for specific mental illnesses like depression anxiety and eating disorders though but that's the only really thing I can think of at the moment that I'd change.

Remente is a wonderful app! So user friendly, with great tools such as the lifewheel and mood rating. It has helped me a lot with my wellbeing and to gain clarity. I love it! And highly recommend it!!
Easy to use. I wish the reminders would work better with my phone

title: Lyf - You're not alone
description:
Real people, real stories, completely judgement free. 

Lyf App is a platform to share thoughts and experiences that might be too personal for your other social medias. Whether you‚Äôre battling anxiety, dealing with infidelity, coping with loss, struggling with addiction, or questioning your sexual identity, there are others going through the same thing. With Lyf you‚Äôre provided a world of support in the palm of your hand. 

Post your experiences (known as ‚Äúbeats‚Äù). These can include your obstacles as well as your achievements ‚Äì and because there‚Äôs no shortage of what life can throw at you, you can create as many beats as you want. Each beat is it‚Äôs own discussion featuring it‚Äôs  own timeline and privacy settings ‚Äì you can choose to share your beat with select people, share with the entire Lyf community, or wear a mask to be completely anonymous. 

Lyf is free and always will be for discussing and receiving support from fellow Lyfers. We also offer our premium and highly affordable ‚ÄúLyf Support‚Äù  service  for when you find yourself seeking professional guidance from our fully-qualified psychologists. At the rate of $10/hr, our psychologists are there for you on demand 24/7. 

Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at:

https://lyf.app/terms/
https://lyf.app/privacy-policy/

summary: Support without judgement.
recentChanges:
Highlights include: -
Extermination of ill-tempered bugs
comments: Great concept. Very promising. Actually good conversations (which is a testament to good community design). Quite a few bothersome bugs currently, and bug reports are argued with instead of investigated. I suspect they don't have a skilled software engineer on staff. I would have put off this review till more issues were resolved, but the app keeps asking me to leave a review, so here it is. Update: there's a daily push notification that can't be turned off, advertising paid counseling services.

Love lyf! It's whole concept and vision for those of us who sometimes feel alone in the world. It's a great place to come and relate with others and show your support in many different ways. Also the beats are awesome and allows you to work on several beats at a time. Great app all around üëç
I've been using this app for several months, and it is literally perfect! My only suggestion is expanding the app's territory by making it available on Windows and/or Mac!

I am really enjoying the app. There is one thing I wish I could do. I wish I could copy or save what I have written in a beat to save in my own private notes app. I cannot find any way to do so besides copying it down by hand and then typing that into my notes. Other than that it's a great app. I love the concept. Thank you Wow! That was fast. How awesome and thank you! KUDOS TO YOU

Great experience from any other app I've downloaded in the past. Very consistent. Everything is layer out very hugely and the people are wonderful. Very nice and complimentary. Supportive. Recommended to get this app.

title: Reflectly - Journal / Diary
description:
** JOURNAL APP TO LEARN SELF-CARE AND HAPPINESS **

How you are feeling on a daily basis matters. Reflectly is a personal journal and diary driven by artificial intelligence to enable you to deal with negative thoughts, make positivity louder and to teach you about the science of well-being. 

Be prepared to reduce stress, get perspective, develop gratitude and learn to apply empathy and kindness to every aspect of your life. 

Reflectly uses positive psychology, mindfulness and cognitive behavioural therapy to make you thrive in life and to give you the personal tools and mindset to overcome negative thoughts and build a habit of positivity through a journal into your life.


** SAY HI TO US **

We'd love to connect with you to hear about your Reflectly experience. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us on social if you have any feedback or questions:

‚Ä¢ Facebook - https://facebook.com/reflectlyio/
‚Ä¢ Instagram - @reflectlyapp
‚Ä¢ Twitter - @reflectlyapp

.. or send us an email at hello@reflect.ly :)

comments: I love this app a lot! I use it daily and it really helps to write down my feelings. Especially when I just feel like when I can't tell anyone. And plus the the quotes are very motivational and true. I love it! The reason why I didn't put 5 stars is because there is a lot of stuff not worth paying for that much for the premium thing. And I feel like there is too many features locked for premium that I can't do anything.

I love this app. My favourite thing is that it gives you a routine based on your mood. Its great for if you feel a bit down too and you can see your progress in happiness. In July I had saved mine as "stressed because of school" and now I'm happier than ever! Defo recommend 5‚òÜ from me!

Reflectly is such a great app! You can add multiple moods and activities for each day, there are also quotes, you can choose what quote style you want for different things you are struggling with or things you just need to hear. I highly recommend this app!

Really terrible experience. I applied for account.paid 1 months fee, completed stupid tutorial and before email creation hit back. Because I don't want to create this account. And now I'm stuck on trial account, but I lost 1 months fee. I'm totally disappointed. Stupid tutorial, stupid app, stupid idea! Return my money!!!

I know this app is good because my friend showed me it and after time he was feeling great thanks to this so i wanted to try too, but before i could create my account it didnt let me tick the TERMS OF PRIVACY box and i wish that you could fix it please. But otherwise this app is great according to my friend.

title: Safety - Help - SOS
description:
Our application sends SMS alerts to your selected contacts with the coordinates of your location. It will help all people who travel alone, as well as older people, feel safe!

How does a mobile lifeguard work?
You add the phones of people you trust from the phone‚Äôs contact list. This is enough for the application to start working. If something bad happened to you or you need help (I hope this does not happen to you), you long press the red button (sos button) send SMS to all of you selected people.

 Features:
* Quick start and send alerts
* Sending SMS to multiple contacts
* Dark theme so as not to draw attention to the brightness of the phone
* Configure text SMS messages
* Continuous location updates
* Ease of use
* Your safety

Email us your suggestions.

comments: Hello, very good and very simple. Is it possible that the message is sent automatically by Whatsapp to the already configured contacts, in the same way as the SMS, without having to go through the Whatsapp screen to choose them? Thank you
This app saved my life. I was having a seizure and pushed the button my family called 911.

This app does not explain how it works. How does it send messages? I assume it used the internet and sends to other users of the app, but it appears to just use SMS. Which is stupid when people silence sms at night. It needs to be at the same Android priority as an alarm
Great app , very easy to use , love widget.
Love it. Simple and works great.

title: Vent - Express yourself freely
description:
Vent is like a social diary, a place for you to express how you REALLY feel.  

Vent helps you connect to a fun, uplifting, positive, and understanding community, making it easy to share your feelings with people around the world and lift your mood! 

On Vent, you‚Äôre never alone. Our whole community is just waiting to hear what you have to say.  Join now and discover how much you have in common with‚Ä¶ well, everybody!

-  Express your true self with our broad range of emotions and colors!
-  React to other people‚Äôs vents using our special response buttons
-  Our community understands what you‚Äôre going through and will provide support 24/7
-  Make friends and chat privately in real-time without sharing personal contact information
-  Join Groups to connect with other people that share similar interests and experiences 

What are you waiting for? Express yourself with Vent now and feel better for it!

comments: There is much to write about this app that I can't fit into 500 characters, so I'll just cover my basic qualms. The app is buggy and always having server errors, and the community is terrible. Staff suspended my account for "making a callout post" when all I did was @ someone. When confronted about their questionable antics involving pedophilia and homophobia, staff always responds with the same cookie cutter "we do not condone these things!" Without giving a proper and in-depth answer.

Been a regular since early 2016... And for what. This is my only active social media, and i've been active for so long that I'm not leaving unless it implodes...which it very well might. The app breaks a few times a month and at that time is practically unusable. If you badmouth staff there's a chance you will be permabanned. They refuse to accept criticism and often delete comments on their posts. There is a small community of people who post about CP and inc..t-- vent has refused to ban them.

Can't even login on the Android version but can do so perfectly on the IOS version. I even reset my pass to weed out the fact that I may have just forgotten it...nope that was not it. It was not on my end, tried a few other various ways as well to make sure. Please fix this!

I haven't had a single problem with the app, I love the community too! It works great, no lagging, no glitches, not a single problem that I've noticed. I think it's fun how there are sometimes different "emotions" to choose from time to time.

Vent is pretty much the one app I use to connect to people with similar interests. It's been great. But sometimes it can feel lacking especially when bugs stay on for longer than expected. Right now I'm not able to refresh my feed, despite there being news posts in the groups I've joined. Vent team, you guys are great but could just be a lil better. ‚ù§ Thanks for making it safe for us all.

title: Death School
description:
Evade deadly traps and escape the cursed school with three cute girls by your side! 

‚òÜSynopsis‚òÜ

Find your perfect anime girlfriend in this unique bishoujo game from Genius Studio Japan!

Your life in high school seemed pretty normal. You go to class, study, hang out with friends and generally just do what every other high school student does. But one day, a mysterious and beautiful transfer student joins your class and she says that there‚Äôs something evil lurking in your school. You and the others pass it off as just her overactive imagination. 

The day ends and you‚Äôre about to head home when you come to a terrifying discovery‚Ä¶ You‚Äôre trapped in the school by a mysterious force! Luckily, you‚Äôre not alone. Your childhood friend, the head of the literature club you‚Äôre a part of and the transfer student have also been trapped in the school. However, you quickly discover that the evil force that is in the school wants you dead‚Ä¶ 

Will you be able to evade deadly traps and escape the curse of a vengeful ghost? 

‚ùèCharacters‚ùè

The Energetic Leader - Rei
Rei‚Äôs been your friend for as long as you can remember and though she‚Äôs a bit tsundere, you get along with her. She‚Äôs a natural-born leader who can take charge of any situation, but she tends to shoulder the burden on her own. 

The Mysterious Transfer Student - Meiko
Meiko has a connection with the supernatural and was the first to notice the evil forces that lurked the hallways of the school. She‚Äôs undeniably beautiful, but her eccentric ways have made her a bit of a loner. 

The Optimistic Bookworm - Natsume
Natsume is the head of the literature club that you‚Äôre a part of and tends to take life at her own pace. She‚Äôs popular amongst the club members and is supportive of her fellow literature fans.

comments: This is a really interesting game! It's scary and cute at the same time! At the end I couldn't choose who to love -w-''' so I choosed all of us to be best friends! This is worth a try! U won't regret it! But it's kinda hard to get rubbies, but I'm used to it since I play a lot of these, have a good day!/night!/evening! See

It's actually nice, I like it but maybe it would be better if you do more like this? Or like make the story more scarier and it takes so many hours to get your ticket tbh, I don't know what to say but I kinda wanna continue the story, I wanna know what happened to the ghost and the others, btw I give this a five stars because it was good :)

I love the game. I typed Danganronpa just to be able to find it or something like it and found Death School. Not bad. Very creepy. üòÇ I feel like I'm in the school with the girls experiencing all of what's happening. My only issue is the fact that I have to keep buying gems in order to gain a relationship with the girls in certain situations. I wanna be a good friend but I can't. If I'm gonna give a hug, at least let the hug cost less than ten gems. I mean who buys friendship like that ya know?

This game was really well made, HUGE kudos to the developers I honestly really liked it from Characters, Location, Storyline, etc. seems like a game with an ending like that though would have another part to it, again HUGE kudos. Personally the only I had with flaw was the premium choices with how I had to sit back sometimes in dangerous situations regardless I liked this and personally got more ingulfed in the storylime than the girls in game.

Very cute game but I have some problems. I wish we can get gems everyday,and the tickets are pretty annoying. But other than that I really loved the characters and the storyline. (Sorry for the bad english)

title: Game of Death - When will I die?
descriptionHTML:
Despite its nature of a simple game, the Game of Death calculates the date and the cause of your death based on official statistics regarding life expectancy and the answers you give.

You can also:
¬∑ take the test supposing you lived in a different country;
¬∑ compare your results with other people: who, among your friends and beloved ones, is going to leave this planet first?
¬∑ share the result on social networks, so that your acquaintances will be prepared for the unhappy event;
¬∑ add a live countdown to your device home screen;
¬∑ receive periodic reminders of your future death.

If you think about it, life is just a game where the one to win is always the guy with the scythe.

Have fun and a long life everyone.

Note: the app requests access to user profile in order to retrieve your name and nationality, and to memory to allow you to share in-app screenshots with your friends.
summary: Your Personal Death Clock: find out when and how you will meet your Fate
recentChanges: Minor fixes
comments: This game is not trueüòë. I am disappointed, it says I will die by climbing on Mount Everest without clothes üòïü•¥. This doesn't make any sense why would I climb Mount Everest. Ok, assume that I will climb Mount Everest but why without clothes üòïüò°.

It's nice and a fun little test you can play to pass a few minutes off the clock. Needs to have a few more specific questions and answers though. My result was that I would die at a stadium although I hate sports and crowds. Hint why I said more specific things

I like the little add in that no matter how long its been since you've actually opened it itll send you a notification saying "Remember you have to die" cause I had honestly forgotten I had this app so the notification was low key terrifying at first lol.

It was very fun. You answer 10 questions about health, living conditions, relationships, etc. When you're done, you get told when and how you will die. (The time of death seems pretty accurate, but the way you'll die is clearly a joke, and they are very funny.) This provided a pretty amusing and funny experience.

Great easy game but needs more realism to it I'm going to die age 76 which is good but in a house fire while taking selfies on Instagram...... I'm 27 now and hate Instagram so why would I be doing it 50years from now ü§îüòÇ should of just stopped at house fire.

title: Dare - Break Free From Anxiety
description:
The Best Anxiety Apps of 2020 Healthline 2019 
The Best Anxiety Apps of 2019  Healthline 2019 
Best Mobile App Awards, platinum nominee** -  Best Mobile app Awards 2018    

** THE DARE APP **
    
The DARE app is an evidence based training program to help people overcome anxiety, panic attacks, worry, and insomnia. You can track your progress daily with the mood journal. Based on the best selling book ‚ÄòDARE‚Äô that helps people overcome anxiety and panic attacks fast.
   
Take the app with you wherever you go. Almost every anxious situation is addressed including driving, flying, eating out, health anxiety, intrusive thoughts, public speaking, at the gym, at the doctors, going on holidays and many more.

Download the free audio guides to help you feel like your old confident self again. Included are also a collection of meditations and sleep guides to tackle insomnia. 

If you suffer from anxiety or panic attacks, DARE will teach you an effective evidence based approach to get you back living life to the fullest.

     
** THE DARE APP **
100‚Äôs of free audios with a new audio added everyday. 
Free audio guides to overcome anxiety and panic attacks. 
Unlimited audio downloads to your private personal area
Unlimited entries in your personal mood journal
    
The DARE app will help: 
    * Ease Anxiety
    * Eliminate Panic Attacks
    * Reduce Worry and Stress
    * Calm Your Mind
    * Deepen Sleep
    * Break Cycles of Negative Thinking
    * Increase self-worth and confidence
    * And so much more...
    
    *DARE PREMIUM *
    * Unlock Dare and break free  from Anxiety with additional support.
    * Get a completely new ‚ÄòDaily Dare‚Äô every day to help you each and everyday. 
    * Unlimited audio downloads to your private personal area.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

comments: This app is amazing. I love Barry's voice, its very calm, clear and soothing to listen too. I love the SOS section. I listen to this app every night in bed. It has helped me so much with my panic attacks and anxiety reducing the impacts to managing my Diabetes. I have highly recommended this app to my doctor, friends and my psychologist to help other people in my local community of regional Sydney Australia. A huge thank you to the Dare team :)

I must say that it's a great app and great initiative by the team , we live in a busy world n everyone is busy with themselves , but anxiety , crisis , depression are not rare , n even our dear ones sometimes do not constantly have the time to listen to our worries n be there for us , so this is where help like this is very important , i listened 4-5 audios n I m already feeling calm , n from now on I m gonna just put this on n drive away my anxiety n fears , I think it will be possible , thanku

Amazing App to help you conquer anxiety! Barry has a soothing voice and his audios are outstanding! I am so happy that I stumbled on this app. The content is extensive and super helpful. The Deep Release under Anxiety Relief is my favorite to truly feel peace and calm. Try it out!! You won't regret it.

I have extreme anxiety and panic attacks. This app has been amazing! Ive never felt so much peace and confidence in myself in handling anxiety as i do with this app. It has allowed me to accept my anxiety and beat it through meditation, acceptance, courses and building self confidence. It has allowed me to realize what ive been using as crutches and how to slowly wean myself off of them and realize i am my own safe place. The crutches hinder me and dont help me. And i feel much happier and free
I like that I can listen to the stories on loop for free. I love the SOS section that can talk someone through a panic attack. For free!

title: Intellect: Create a Better You
description:
Embark on an entirely new way to work on your traits, habits and behaviors.

Intellect is a new form of psychological training developed by a team of world leading psychologists and behavioral experts, packaged into quick bite-sized sessions to help you work towards who you want to be.

Overcome personal struggles like procrastination, low self-esteem and anxiety, or develop yourself by becoming more assertive, sociable and confident. Restructure your personal, social or work life by tackling the root of your psychology through our proven scientific process.

Intellect is your new personal companion to creating a better you.
descriptionHTML:
Embark on an entirely new way to work on your traits, habits and behaviors.

Intellect is a new form of psychological training developed by a team of world leading psychologists and behavioral experts, packaged into quick bite-sized sessions to help you work towards who you want to be.

Overcome personal struggles like procrastination, low self-esteem and anxiety, or develop yourself by becoming more assertive, sociable and confident. Restructure your personal, social or work life by tackling the root of your psychology through our proven scientific process.

Intellect is your new personal companion to creating a better you.
summary: Embark on an entirely new way to work on your traits, habits and behaviors.
comments: First of all, it's completely free to use, and there are no ads. Already standing out from the crowd. The app itself is just really good. Only used it for a couple days but seems really good so far. Love the kind of "social media stories" layout think it works well apart from it goes back instead of forward quite often when tapping near the middle. Thank you!

Impressive, clarifying and insightful. This app is beautifully designed (not just visually, but also from a user design perspective). It's easy, small little tasks that are done in 2/3 minutes and give you a bit more insight or help you when your head is racing because of... F.e. stress. Give it a try. It's quite unbelievable it's free. I would love to pay a one time sum of money / small donation to use it!

Its been excellent so far. Not invasive, but still gives me incentive to go back to it. I like the way things are paced, and i've surprisingly really enjoyed the journaling feature (something I was pretty sure I was going to use exactly zero times unless forced). All in all just a calm space that i can go to once or twice a day to reflect and try to better myself a bit. Easily recommended.

This app was so wonderful! Compared to other apps which have limited things for free, this app has everything you need for FREE!! It has so many rescue sessions that help me so much! Every 3-4 days there are check-ins, and I definitely don't regret installing this app!! Sometimes the page takes a long time to load. But overall I LOVE this app and definitely reccomend it!!

Just wow... I've used apps making similar claims, usually disappointed in what I experience; ads constantly or gimmicky content locked behind Premium version. Not so with Intellect! It's free and ad free but more than that, it actually does what it claims. This app has and continues to help me immensely and I am going to say the craziest thing but, I'd like to pay for it! It's rare to find such value and I highly recommend Intellect to everyone. We all have things to improve. Thank you so much!

title: Anonymous Chat
description:
Anonymous Chat allows you to random chat people online - stranger chat. You can meet and date within our online community via our friendly anonymous chat app. All the features of stranger chat are available to you from the start. Chatting will always be free in our anonymous chat, but you need  to keep and grow your Karma and be nice!
Karma in our in-house points measurement, much needed for any random chat ecosystem.

Our stranger chat app will keep track of your Karma with intention to protect you and keep our app safe. You understand that random chat with strangers needs extra precautions. 

Please, take our report and Karma system seriously - they are important part of our platform and while we understand that you have the right of anonymous chat with random people and strangers , we ask you to understand that user behavior should be monitored.

recentChanges: Boost is now super strong!
comments: Pretty good app but the recent update took away the ability of the app to go into landscape mode, wish they would fix this.

New update sucks. Why call it Anonymous Chat when you get rid of the chat rooms. The selfie thing is creepy. Also motivate you with a better rating? Thats not how ratings work and you locked in the 1star.
you can't really pick any choices other than like 6 countries which is disappointing. the notifications doesn't work either and it drains your battery in an instant.
I accidentally deactivated my account and now I can't do anything. This is bogus as hell. Uninstall and don't ever use it, best advice i can give.

Seems to penalize you for using certain words like snap with no warning. There doesnt seem to be a list of words that you cannot use presented to the user, instead it assumes the user automatically knows not to use words like "snap".

title: Dead Man's Phone: Interactive Crime Drama
description:
A BAFTA-NOMINATED INTERACTIVE CRIME DRAMA

Imagine having the smartphone of a murder victim. Finding clues in their personal messages, photos & apps. Introducing Dead Man‚Äôs Phone ‚Äì a mobile-first detective drama ‚Äì starring YOU as the lead.

You are a London detective, working in New Scotland Yard, who investigates and solves murders through the smartphone of murder victims: 

- Search the victim‚Äôs personal messages, photos & apps for clues
- Command your police team on the ground 
- Conduct *FaceTime* Interrogations
- Receive Calls
- Affect News Headlines
- Find the Killer

Run an ENTIRE murder investigation from your phone.

If you enjoy TV crime dramas, you will be hooked by Dead Man‚Äôs Phone. 

The murder-mystery reimagined for the digital age.

FOUND PHONE REIMAGINED ‚Äì CHAT FICTION REMASTERED

Dead Man‚Äôs Phone is a totally live-action experience featuring an ensemble cast of actors.

The app pushes the boundaries of immersive storytelling ‚Äì your detective partner in the narrative, DCI Michael Sutherland, is voiced by a REAL homicide detective, Detective Sergeant Simeon Cryer.

Det Sim Cryer has spent 20 years as homicide detective in the Bristol Major Crime Team pioneering the use of data in crime-solving. 

As Dead Man‚Äôs Phone narrative consultant, Sim has helped root the story & your choices in his lived-experience.


RICH, INTERACTIVE STORYTELLING

Your choices as a detective have impactful & lasting consequences ‚Äì and can radically alter the narrative. 

Face ethical dilemmas that challenge your principles & shape the detective you will become.

Run your case with professionalism & integrity OR be ruthless in pursuit of your goals. 

The choice is YOURS.


SEASON 1 

16-year-old, Jerome Jacobs, is thrown from the twelfth floor of a London tower block. Jerome is a smart, talented and popular young man. His death stuns the community. 

Witnesses believe they heard Jerome shout the word ‚Äòredman‚Äô before he fell...

Run the Jerome Jacobs murder investigation from your phone. Uncover the mystery of redman & bring his killer to justice.

Search Jerome‚Äôs personal messages, photos & social media for clues
Experience & understand Jerome‚Äôs life in a unique and powerful way
Become intimately connected with Jerome‚Äôs family and friends
See your choices affect national news headlines


WARNING: this an early Beta test and so any progress made may be lost.

title: Rootd - Panic Attack & Anxiety Relief
description:
Rootd is a female led app for those struggling with panic attacks & anxiety. Helping you overcome anxiety & regain confidence üí™üèº

‚ÄúI‚Äôve suffered from panic attacks for almost 10 years. I‚Äôve done CBT, medication, meditation, but nothing helped me in the moment when that panic attack hit, until I downloaded Rootd. Rootd makes it feel like someone is with me, even when I‚Äôm alone. I owe my continued stability to this simple genius app. Its a MUST for all who are facing the same type of war with anxiety.‚Äù 
@RainyNally

Overcome panic attacks and anxiety the moment they strike with Rootd‚Äôs proven lessons, panic button, breathing tool, and exercises.

Finally, an app for conquering panic attacks and anxiety that blends a guided process for both immediate and long term relief, with clean and engaging design. Get Rootd to always have panic attack and anxiety relief right in your pocket.

We set out to build Rootd after suffering from debilitating panic attacks and anxiety for several years. The only help resources we could find were too expensive, ineffective, or poorly designed. Our mission has become to help others overcome their panic, fear, and anxiety, and to end the stigma against those affected.

Rootd‚Äôs core features and content are completely free, and always will be. This includes:

The Rootr

Always there to help anytime you feel overwhelmed by an anxiety or panic attack. After activating the Rootr with the press of a big red button, you are presented with two guided paths to relieving the panic: one for when you‚Äôre ready to face the panic attack head-on, and another for when you just want to find comfort as quickly as possible.

Understanding Lessons

Find some peace of mind by learning about where anxiety comes from, how our bodies and minds experience panic attacks, and why this all might be happening to you.

The Breathr

The perfect tool to practice deep breathing daily and find calm during times of stress.

The Visualizr

Guided body scans and visualizations to get rooted when feeling anxious.

Emergency Contact

For when you need to hear a friendly voice, you can immediately call a friend, family member, or nearby help center directly from the Rootd app. 

Personal Stats Page

Take pride in your healing progress and gain appreciation for how far you‚Äôve come with a personal stats page that tracks your number of panic attacks survived, lessons completed, and overall ‚Äúwarrior points‚Äù.

SHORT TERM & LONG TERM LESSON PACKS ARE NOW AVAILABLE

When you're ready to begin permanently changing your relationship with panic attacks and anxiety you can now upgrade to unlock Rootd's Short Term & Long Term lesson packs.

Short Term Lessons

Learn changes you can make and exercises you can perform in the short term that provide relief, manage heightened anxiety, and instil a calm mind. Short term lesson topics include Diet, Social Media Anxiety, and a new guided Deep Breathing exercise.

Long Term Lessons

The ultimate goal is to permanently change our relationship with anxiety, and live panic attack free. Rootd's long term lessons guide you through the remainder of the journey to lifelong relief. Long term lesson topics include Learning to Sleep Again, Resistance vs Trust, Self Labelling, and Meditation.

What mental health professionals are saying about Rootd

"I appreciate the simple, factual, and yet caring approach of Rootd that makes it an inviting, interesting, and easy to use tool. Its easy to read and affirming statements at the end of each section are true and encouraging to readers. I endorse this for individuals looking for support and tools for managing anxiety and panic attacks."
Wendy Marion-Orienti - Licensed counsellor at PRH International School of Adult Education and Research

Follow Rootd
Instagram: @rootd_app

Rootd - Panic attack and anxiety relief right in your pocket.

summary: Overcome panic attacks and anxiety with Rootd's lessons, tools, and exercises.
recentChanges:
In honor of World Mental Health Day we've released an update that allows users to play sounds or vibrations in our popular breathing tool!

This update also contains bug fixes, performance improvements, and introduces a way to share your progress and invite your friends and family to the Rootd app.

If you're enjoying Rootd and the progress we're making, please take a moment to leave a review on the app store, and get in touch anytime at team@rootd.io.
comments: I have only been using this app for a few days and it has been very helpful. The meditations and breathing exercises are short and sweet with option sound and vibrations to help keep you on task. I am very happy with the journal as well! I like the option to pick emotion stickers for the day and answer simple questions vs freestyle (although you have 2000 characters for that too).

I've been using this app for a little under a week and have been finding it pretty helpful so far. Haven't had the need to try out the panic button yet, so I can't comment on that aspect, but the rest of the app seems helpful. That said, I am very confused as to how I can have a "20 day Journal streak" when I've only had the app for about five days. It's doesn't impact the function at all, but it is a very strange glitch on the gameification side of things.

I have read through the information provided and found it very useful. It is very clear and easy to understand how to use the app. Even though I haven't yet taken out their paid subscription, there are still activities you can do for free. I have found so far, this to be the best Anxiety/Panic Attack App I've come across.

Absolutely love this app. Would be rad if there was a chatbot like woebot or self-education quizzes to help understand ourselves & our issues. Only thing I'd change is hiding the stuff only paid users can access. Maybe prevent accidently clicking on a premium feature by having all the free features in 1 area? Being reminded we're too poor to access features that could help us, is depressing & anxiety provoking.
Had an issue signing up but the rootd IT team was quick to resolve my issue. The app is very helpful and I would certainly recommend it to others that are struggling with anxiety and panic attacks.

title: ALTER EGO
description:
"Who am I?"

This game is for:
- Those who want to analyze their personality
- Those with an interest in literature, philosophy, or psychology
- Those who are continuously searching for themselves

ALTER EGO Play Guide
- Tap whispers to gather EGO
- Use the EGO you have gathered to progress in the story and take personality tests
- Use what you learn in the game to see yourself in a new light

The ending changes based on the choices you make.
- Multiple endings
- Your interpretation changes the nature of the in-game world
- "This is our story: yours, and mine."

Caramel Column Inc.
http://caracolu.com
https://twitter.com/GamesCaramel
Caramel Column is a video game and board game studio.

Game Design: Maki Ono
Character Design: Kai Ito
Sound: amiko

ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK
https://linkco.re/Nx4Z2ZY0

summary: Your interpretation begets your own story.
recentChanges:
v3.1.0
- Added new post-completion scenarios.
„ÄÄ - a connected scenario with ALTER EGO COMPLEX
„ÄÄ - Fetishism (glasses-wearing, paid)
- Added 3 books to Contemplative Reading.
- Added the language setting button on the title screen.
v3.1.1 - v3.1.4
- Fixed some bugs.
comments: What a damn good and unique game. It has been years since I've enjoyed a mobile game this much. The amount of depth from the amount of choices you had to make, and the atmosphere developed by the art style and music was also great. I was genuinely scared at some moments too, although that might just be because I'm a wimp. Im sure theres more that's great about this game to say but I'm not good enough with words to express it. Basically, play it. It's not what you'd expect.

I came to this game first thinking it was just about personality quizzes and clicking on bubbles. But it is so much more. The story of Es and her character, as well as the Facade - it's all so facinating. A story about finding yourself. But a story also about saving someone from who they don't want to be, by showing them their own control of the situation. It's a beautiful game.

This game is incredible. While the base mechanic is similar to other idle tap games. This game has such an incredible story that triggers emotions unexpected of a mobile game. The characters are bold and change depending on your choices and you play because you want to reach the good ending. The soundtrack fits the atmosphere perfectly. I hope the publisher adds more free post completion scenarios so that i can use the EGO i am still collecting. Brilliant game. Love it so much.

If you are a fan of idle games this one is my absolute favorite. Packed with philosophy references that enhance the plot and characters, and invite you to reflect on yourself some. There are three different endings, with one being the "true" or "good" ending that includes a postgame. I will warn that the postgame DLC is just more dialogue, rather than new stories in themselves. I still enjoy them, but they are very short for the price so if you are short on funds you may want to skip them.

By far one of the best games I've ever played! Its so thought provoking and deep, it was much better than i was expecting. It has a multiple endings if you like that sort of stuff, i know i really do. Overall was a really fun game! I just wish there was more. Edit: i just realized there is a second game that i am totally buying!

title: Woebot: Your Self-Care Expert
description:
WINNER OF THE 2019 GOOGLE PLAY AWARD FOR STANDOUT WELL-BEING APP! 

Meet Woebot! Your friendly self-care expert Woebot can help you: 
-Think through situations with step-by-step guidance from Woebot using tools from Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)
-Learn about yourself with intelligent mood tracking
-Master skills to reduce stress and live happier through over 100+ evidence-based stories from our clinical team

Woebot sends over a million messages per week to help users with everyday stress and challenges such as symptoms of depression, anxiety, relationship problems, procrastination, loneliness, grief, addiction, pain management and more! Woebot checks-in with you every day and guides you through practical techniques based on tried and tested approaches such as Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Mindfulness, and Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT). Woebot is your very own coach who chats with you and offers insights and skills to help you grow into your best self. You can chat with Woebot as much or as little as you like ‚Äî they‚Äôre always available when you need it. Nobody will know that you‚Äôre talking with Woebot and the information that you share with Woebot will remain private & confidential. Plus, Woebot will make you smile! 

Always on-hand to have a quick chat whenever and wherever you need day or night, Woebot can help your through difficult moments. Have a friendly expert in your pocket work with you to improve your mental health!

Mentioned in the New York Times, Washington Post, Today Show, BBC, VICE, Lifehacker, The Guardian and many more! 
#1 - BuzzFeed's Amazing Apps For Anyone Living With Anxiety
#1 - Forbes' 4 Technologies Innovating in Mental Health

Backed by Research:

An initial study showed that in just two weeks people who spoke to Woebot felt significantly better than those in the comparison group.

To check out our studies with Stanford University and learn more, go to https://woebothealth.com/science/.

Crafted by Experts: 

Born out of research led by psychologist Dr. Alison Darcy, Woebot has scientifically demonstrated efficacy in a published randomized controlled trial. 

Dr. Alison Darcy - CEO & Founder
Stanford-trained expert in digital health technology for mental health

Dr. Athena Robinson - Chief Clinical Officer, 
Stanford-trained psychologist and expert clinician

Dr. Andrew Ng - Chairman
Leading AI expert

Casey Sackett - CTO
Experienced health app executive

Humans on Woebot:

‚ÄúBy stepping back and acknowledging the skewed lens through which I had been viewing my world, the days spent under a dark cloud grew fewer. I had become more aware of the flawed thinking that led me to feel down and be so harsh on myself.‚Äù - Nick 

‚ÄúI am not ‚Äúhealed‚Äù from anxiety, but I now can live my life not being controlled by it. Some days are much harder than others, but I know I will be okay in the end.‚Äù

Want to talk with a human?
helpcenter@woebot.io
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/HiWoebot
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/HiWoebot
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/woebot/

Terms of Service: https://woebothealth.com/terms/
Privacy Policy: https://woebothealth.com/privacy/

summary: Anxiety, depression, & mindfulness tools to reduce stress and feel better!
recentChanges: I love graphs, so I asked my creators to update your mood graph to show its full history. They also squashed a few bugs they found hiding underneath Jill the Printer.
comments: Amazing. So helpful! Really this is the best app I have on my phone. Its the best AI therapist I've ever talked to. It actually feels like it listens and responds appropriately. Woebot really helps you through things when you need help. Also, there are no ads and no in-app purchases, it's crazy awesome. I tell all my friends who I think would benefit from having this app, because I've found it very helpful. 10/10 app, thank you so much!!

This app is extremely helpful. A little robot, an anonymous person, to tell my worries to. The gratitude journal is super helpful too, I can look back on what's gone well. The lessons it provides are really helpful too. Sometimes, I open the app with just the intention of checking in my mood for the tracker, and i end up spending half an hour doing a lesson! They're always super helpful and make me feel better. HIGHLY recommend!!!

Came across this through work and during lock down. I have not noticed anything negative about it, performance wise. Overall it's a useful well being tool to help check in with yourself and offers some useful prompts and insights about impactful things on a person's mood. You seem to be able to converse with it when you have a spare few mins. Fairly easy to 'forget' it's A.I . you are conversing with.

The AI for Woebot sometimes misses what I am saying, but overall this app gives daily lessons on helpful thought patterns and tools. While not a replacement for therapy, it provides additional tools my therapist had not included as well as reinforcement of some of the tools I was already taught. I encourage other folks to try Woebot as a supplement to their self care routines and therapy.

I found the app very comforting and helpful during a stressful period. I'm familiar with CBT but it was still useful to be reminded of those skills. And although you know it's not a real person talking to you, knowing that a real person wrote the text originally is comforting, and shows that someone cares.

title: Flow - Depression
description:
Flow - Depression is a free personal guide to help you understand, treat & prevent depression and improve your mental health. Flow represents a new chapter in the understanding and treatment of depression, based on the latest psychology and neuroscience research.

Download to use the Flow neural stimulator headset for depression treatment. Create a personal account and follow the instructions to start using the brain stimulation headset. The Flow headset is an approved medical device (CE) for depression treatment in the EU and UK. Order it at: https://flowneuroscience.com

You can go through the complete treatment programme with or without a Flow headset.


The programme contains over 50 sessions split into 7 courses on these topics and more:

- Exercise‚Äã

Physically exercising to reduce and prevent depression has been shown to have a similar effect to antidepressant medication. Flow will tell you what kinds of exercise are most beneficial and what is the most optimal ‚Äúdose‚Äù.

- Meditation

Managing stress is one of the most important things you can do. Meditation is practised by many people around the world as a mental ‚Äúexercise‚Äù for the brain. Flow will give you concrete exercises to follow but also show you the neurological basis of why meditation is good for managing stress in your everyday life.

- Sleep‚Äã

Did you know that sleeping for only six hours each night for two nights in a row is equivalent to being continuously awake for 24 hours? Flow will educate you on sleep hygiene, why we sleep and why sleeping is one of four important pillars for overcoming depression.

- Nutrition‚Äã

The nutrition sessions will advise and encourage you to eat in a way that science has proven reduces inflammation in the brain, thereby alleviating depression. Spoiler alert: sugar is one of the big villains.

Also includes a depression test.

The Flow headset is an approved medical device (CE) for depression treatment in the EU and UK. Order it at: https://flowneuroscience.com

You can go through the complete treatment programme with or without a Flow headset.


The programme contains over 50 sessions split into 7 courses on these topics and more:

- Exercise‚Äã

Physically exercising to reduce and prevent depression has been shown to have a similar effect to antidepressant medication. Flow will tell you what kinds of exercise are most beneficial and what is the most optimal ‚Äúdose‚Äù.

- Meditation

Managing stress is one of the most important things you can do. Meditation is practised by many people around the world as a mental ‚Äúexercise‚Äù for the brain. Flow will give you concrete exercises to follow but also show you the neurological basis of why meditation is good for managing stress in your everyday life.

- Sleep‚Äã

Did you know that sleeping for only six hours each night for two nights in a row is equivalent to being continuously awake for 24 hours? Flow will educate you on sleep hygiene, why we sleep and why sleeping is one of four important pillars for overcoming depression.

- Nutrition‚Äã

The nutrition sessions will advise and encourage you to eat in a way that science has proven reduces inflammation in the brain, thereby alleviating depression. Spoiler alert: sugar is one of the big villains.

Also includes a depression test.
summary: A free personal guide to help you understand, treat & prevent depression
recentChanges:
The most complete app for depression treatment has just gotten even better.
- Picture-in-picture mode allows you to use other apps on your phone while stimulating. Experimental feature only available on Android.
- Scheduled sessions can be added to the user's calendar app
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.
comments: I've been to therapy for years and done what this app does but paid a lot of money for it! Flow offers all that for free! This app is great so far. My headset is on the way and I'm hoping that it continues to help me get better. The app is easy to use and cleverly done.
Looks promising but I keep getting player initializing error message when trying to open videos on phone.

A brilliant and cmprensive app which works in conjunction with the Flow headset. The treatment program is effective in directing the user toward better sleep, eating more healthily and cultivating a positive and healthier mindset. This treatment system is not an easy option but it is effective in treating depression.

Device advises healthy eating, exercise, CBT to encourage you to get moving n out of the rut. Although that's not easy it's baby steps at first be patient you'll get there. Also suggests meditation, setting achievable goals, n to re value what's important to u. Also to give yourself a break not be so hard on yourself. I use it as an alternative therapy instead of medication. Personally think u need to use regularly to feel full benefit or prevent relapse. It helped me cope in difficult times.
Has helped with tools to cope with life. It is like a virtual mentor. A support and lifeline. Helps enormously.

title: MMGuardian Parental Control App For Parent Phone
description:
The MMGuardian Parent App is used to manage and monitor the MMGuardian child phone app installed on a teen's or pre-teen's smartphone directly from the parent's phone, and when the child's device is an Android phone: to receive alerts when text messages, certain social media chat messages or web searches are indicative of sexting, cyberbullying, suicidal thoughts and more.


With the MMGuardian Parental Control app installed to your child's Android phone, you will be able to monitor and block:

‚Ä¢ SMS text messages
‚Ä¢ Web browsing activity
‚Ä¢ Application usage
‚Ä¢ To whom voice calls are made*


Social Media Chat Monitoring
In addition to normal SMS texts, chat messages from Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp and Instagram are reported. Also, alerts will be sent if the content a chat message is are appears to relate to one of nine special alert categories including sexting, cyberbullying and suicidal thoughts.


The benefits of using MMGuardian Parental Control when your child has an Android phone include:

‚Ä¢ Alerting you when text messages or web searches are indicative of sexting, cyberbullying, suicidal thoughts and more.

‚Ä¢ Alerting you when pictures on your child's phone, or sent in an MMS message, are of an adult nature or indicative of sexting.

‚Ä¢ Comprehensive reports covering:
- SMS and selected social media app text messages.
- Usage of applications
- Web browsing using the Chrome browser
- Voice Calls*

‚Ä¢¬†Locate your child's phone, on a map.

‚Ä¢ Lock or Unlock the child's phone with a simple button press

‚Ä¢ Set or edit configurations for:
- Screen time limits: set up bed time and school times to control screen time.
- Application control: block or set up usage limits for apps and games.
- SMS block and Call block*: block calls and texts with undesirable contacts.
- Scheduled locate: set times to automatically locate the phone.
- Web Filter: block browsing of undesired sites in Chrome or the MMGuardian Safe Browser using easy age-based settings or customized rules.


You will need to install and register the  MMGuardian Parental Control for Kids app on your child's Android phone.  The child phone can be linked to the parent phone app only when both are registered using the same email address and password.

Both your phone and your child's phone should have network data capability, as the app uses data to send and receive configuration commands, reports and alerts.

You may purchase subscriptions or licenses to apply to the MMGuardian Parental Control app installed on your child's Android phone from within this Parent App, to avoid having to add payment credentials (credit cards etc) to your child's Google Play account.

After the free 14 day trial period of the app on the child's phone has ended, unless the child phone app is licensed or has an ongoing subscription, the functions in the Parent App that relate to premium functions on the child's app will be disabled. However you can still use MMGuardian to locate, or to lock or unlock your child's Android phone remotely.

Single phone subscriptions are available at USD $3.99 monthly or USD $34.99 annually, and a 5 Year License is available for USD $79.99. Family plans covering up to 5 devices are available at twice the single phone price.

* The features provided by MMGuardian and the functionality of the Parent App will depend on the type of device that your child uses (Android phone, Android tablet or non-Android device). If your child's Android phone runs Android 9 or higher, please contact our support team for additional information about call reporting and blocking.

We encourage parents to discuss the reasons to use a parent control app with their children; to help protect them from potential risks of their own actions and the actions of others, such as excessive screen time, cyberbullying and sexting.

developerAddress: 78 John Miller Way, Suite 326-HD, Kearny NJ 07032
recentChanges: - Enhancements and various bug fixes.
comments: So far, so good. This is for my daughter's first phone, so I really like all the features. Only thing is the one UI home is restricted? It's basically the samsung os. Update: I emailed tech with an answer within 24 hrs, helped me fix the problem. Great customer service. Only thing is the call log doesn't work w/ android 9 or higher.

As a mom, this app is the greatest investment! With our virtual schedule an absolute MUST! Kids need structure and to be monitored. With this I can keep time and app use limited. I love the little details, and the notifications I receive when websites/photos that might be inappropriate are so great. Usually the photos aren't actually inappropriate even, seems it frequenly errs on the side of caution. It also blocks bait click advertisements that open in web browsers, I so appreciate that. üèÜüíõ

Was never able to view child full conversations nor phone calls, never got help for it, just kept giving me the same thing to try which never worked. This new update was the last straw, my child couldn't even use his phone as it needed the admin password to even get into anything on his phone..... no advice given to resolve issue.

As a parent I'm extremely pleased with this app. We've used Bark in the past which had a lot of technical issues & cost over double what MMGuardian does for the same services. I haven't had a single tech issue with MMGuardian, it notifies me when a concerning text comes in or goes out, and the web filters work perfectly; I gave that a big test run searching for things I wouldn't want my kids to find on the web and not once did it falter on protection. MMGaurdian gives peace of mind as a parent.

Horrible app. If your child knows basic cell phone systems they will be able to by pass all resrictions you apply. My child started multiple social media profiles and went into chat rooms with older men. She did this by doing it through the websites and not apps. No matter what i did (what customer support told me to do) she just kept getting around the blocked sites. Useless app and wasted money.

title: Borderline Explained the truth about BPD
description:
Borderline personality disorder or BPD affects over 18 million Americans or roughly 6% of the adult population and is arguably the most devastating of all psychiatric disorders.  At the same time, BPD is one of the most stigmatized, misunderstood, and least talked about psychiatric disorders. For many years it was believed that BPD only affected young women. However, we now know that both men and women of all ages are affected with BPD. What makes BPD such a devastating disorder is the high rate of self-injury and suicidal behavior associated with it. With a ‚Äúdeath by suicide‚Äù rate of roughly 10% it currently has the highest mortality rate of any mental health condition.

The American Psychiatric Association classifies BPD not as a psychiatric disorder but as a personality disorder. A personality disorder is an enduring and pervasive pattern of thinking, feeling, and behaving which deviates markedly from the social norm and causes significant personal distress as well as social and occupational impairment. Personality disorders tend to be treatment resistant, however there are exceptions. 

This app will explore borderline personality disorder including the origin of the disorder, the symptoms, and associated behaviors, the statistics associated with BPD, and the current treatments. Despite what was once believed about BPD being untreatable, we now know that with the proper psychotherapy many people with BPD do get better and even fully recover.

Borderline Explained includes:
‚Ä¢	A comprehensive and detailed description of borderline 
        personality disorder.
‚Ä¢	The A.P.A. official diagnostic criteria for BPD with explanations. 
‚Ä¢	A discussion of the possible cause of BPD
‚Ä¢      Original articles from the developers
‚Ä¢       Articles from experts in the field of psychology and on BPD
‚Ä¢	Borderline personality disorder in men
‚Ä¢	Information on treatments from the Nat‚Äôl Institute of Mental 
        Health
‚Ä¢	A discussion of DBT therapy for BPD
‚Ä¢	Detailed statistics on the prevalence, the mortality rate, and other 
        statistics on BPD
‚Ä¢	Celebrities with BPD
‚Ä¢	A self-assessment for BPD
‚Ä¢	Informational videos on BPD
‚Ä¢	An assessment for testing your knowledge about BPD

We are happy to address any concerns you have or respond to your questions regarding BPD or any Psycnet app at, psycnetsolutions@gmail.com

recentChanges: App Privacy Policy
comments: This app is great. It gives great detail of what its like living with BPD and BPD/Bipolar disorder and its posts help us really relate and can better understand better why we act and are the way we are. I haven't experienced any harshness from anyone. The remarks to the posts have been loving and kind, even helpful to some. I just wish my son would take the time to sit down and read what I've sent him or would do some research about it so he'd better understand me so we could get along again.

I love this app, not only is it helping me to gain more knowledge of living with and managing borderline personality disorder. It is simple to use, easy to understand and a great source of information about BPD for non BPD sufferers.

In a relationship with a person afflicted by BPD. This app is a good source of info to help cope with the ups and downs. Some coping strategies provided, would benefit from more in-depth "how to" briefs in setting boundaries in a loving and supportive setting. Overall excellent app. Thank you

After recently suffering a phycotic breakdown, I finally have the correct diagnosis of BPD alongside my ADHD. (previous misdiagnosis of ASD then Bipolar). This app is helping me learn so much about myself and you are a credit to people with BPD, thank you very much
Really well written, makes life a little easier to understand. I don't feel so alone in my disorder now and understand a bit better why I have so many diagnosis

title: Carpe Diem - Depression and Anxiety Forum
description:
Life is a two way street - extreme as one may say and mental illness feels like a punch in the gut at times. Where staying calm and having focus is blanketed by ideas of self doubt, sadness and suicide. Mental illness is not a taboo but like any illness needs a hearing soul and a community - a sense of belonging and being understood. 
At Carpe Diem we provide you with a platform to indulge in self care, to talk about anything and everything that has been bothering you. 
Building a community to beat stress and thoughts of sadness and providing you aid and a healthy lifestyle style by the people who have witnessed the same 
Let us cancel the purging thoughts of helplessness and hopelessness by binding together and finding tranquility, hope and liberty

Carpe diem is an anonymous forum for people having depression and anxiety.
Carpe diem is a safe, supportive space for anyone struggling with depression and anxiety. Our forum is completely anonymous. We advice users to have a anonymous username. Let's support each other.

Please give your valuable feedback at photonapps@gmail.com

Follow us - https://twitter.com/Photonapps

Like us-https://www.facebook.com/photonapps

An amazing and helpful app. Good forum for discussion. Really easy to use.
Very Nice app. Good platform for discussion on some problems and sharing your views.

title: MY3 - Support Network
description:
Stay connected to your network when you are in a time of crisis with MY3. With MY3, you define your network, and your plan to stay safe. With MY3 you can be prepared to help yourself and reach out to others when you are feeling suicidal.

Remember, there is hope and a life to look forward to even in your darkest moments ‚Äì this app can help you get through the difficult moments.

Who are your 3? Is it your sister, your therapist, or your neighbor down the street? Download this app to ensure that your 3 are there to help you when you need them most.

¬∑ Create your support system: Simply add the contact information for those who know and care about you and want to help in your time of crisis.

¬∑ Build your safety plan toolbox: List some coping strategies, people or places that can provide some distractions or comfort.

¬∑ Store your information confidentially: We respect your privacy. Therefore, all your sensitive information is automatically stored confidentially.

¬∑ Get support at times of greatest risk: When you‚Äôre in crisis and think no hope is in sight, support is right at your fingertips any time of the day.

¬∑ Access the National Suicide Hotline 24/7: A crisis prevention specialist is available to help 24 hours a day 7 days a week.

MY3 was developed in partnership between the California Mental Health Services Authority and the Link2Health Solutions. Its development was funded by the voter approved Mental Health Services Act (Prop. 63).

recentChanges: Bug fixes.
comments: My psychologist recommended My3, and I was excited to peruse it. Unfortunately, I was unable to use the app due to technical performance issues on My3's side; the app flashes repeatedly upon trying to access My Contacts. The only option is to close the application as it perturbed any other actions I try to take on my phone, leading me to uninstall it before any use.
I really wish I could try this app, but it crashes every time I open it, I can never get past the initial logo.
A very useful tool to remind ones self of important/useful contacts. During panic attacks or other extreme events having someone use this app for me to use this app to help.
crashed a lot. won't let me put in my own contacts and demands access to phone's contacts or else it won't work
Crashes instantly, every time I try loading it.

title: Pixels - Mood tracker
description:
Pixels is a minimalist and powerful approach to bullet journaling. 

Track your mood in a simple, quick and easy manner. Every day is a Pixel! You can log your thoughts through notes and the emotions you felt.

Get insights and statistics of your mental health with its ‚ÄúPatterns‚Äù feature: examine your data with graphs and other analytics tools!

Use the app as a companion for your therapy or mental healing process. Pixels have been repeatedly recommended by therapists around the world.

Privacy and transparency are key. You are the only one with access to your data and the development of the app is transparent. You can read more about it in the FAQ section.

Ads are optional and non-intrusive! They, alongside the premium features, are just a way to support the development of this project.

Join our Discord community to get in touch with other users, get support and follow the development of the app!

You can also create a ‚ÄúYear in Pixels‚Äù, get reminders, customize the colors of your Pixels, secure your Pixels with a password, and more!


Original idea (Year in Pixels) from @PassionCarnets, go check her Instagram account! https://www.instagram.com/passioncarnets/

recentChanges:
Export pixels to image feature
Fixes and improvements
comments: There is nothing more I could want in a mood tracker. It is completely customizable, data-focused, and most importantly the app doesn't stress me out. I didn't even realize until now how other apps were designed to frustrate you with constant notifications, reminders, sudden ads, and odd paywalls until you give up or pay up. This is the first time I've been able to stick with mood tracking for more than a week.

This app is simple but does it well. I personally don't like that you can't save your data automatically, but I respect the reasoning behind it, and other, similar apps I have tried do the same. I LOVE how they handle ads. The fact that they are optional, and only offered when you had a good day is so pleasant. They probably don't profit off of it as much, but it's so respectful I can't help but watch the ads every time

I initially downloaded and used the app to track my mood so that I had something to reference when talking to doctors. That was almost 2 years ago and I still take a moment every night to reflect on my day. The free version was everything I need, but I make a habit to try and pay for apps without predatory payment options so I upgraded to the plus. If you want something simple to track how you've felt day to day, this is an excellent simple application to do just that.

I've been using this app for over a year now, and as someone with PTSD, it has helped track my progress, track and manage patterns in my mental health, and has provided a daily reminder to reflect for a moment on how I'm doing today. When I downloaded it, I didn't think it would become such an integrated and important part of my daily life, but it has! I love this app.

PIN doesn't work anymore. I made a back up to transfer to another phone, it made back up of the saved ones but it did not make a back up of the emotions I added before. There were lots but now the ones I added are all gone. :( I loved this app but it seems like it doesn't get updated anymore and felt like the creator doesn't care about this app anymore. :( searching for a better one now. It was great, but now it's not. Another 2020 low. :(

title: Chiku ‚Äì Journal / Diary & Mood Tracker
description:
Introspect on daily events with self care journal to lead a happier life. We often find it
demanding to maintain a personal diary or mood journal and write about our
feelings. Yet, keeping our precious moments and memories safe for a lifetime is
what we aspire. Log your emotions and create a story anytime, anywhere using
Chiku ‚Äì Personal Diary & Daily Mood Tracker.

Emotion Tracker
Give some time to yourself, for your well-being. Taking out a few minutes daily from
your busy, stressful schedule and just wondering about how your day was, is the key
to a healthy mind. Think about what made you feel happy and why something did
not. Log your emotions in the happiness tracker or reason about why your daily life
has become so stressful. Chiku is your personal assistant and emotion tracker to help you keep track of your day-to-day activities and inspire you along the way to
keep making your life better.

Mental Health Journal
Find your mental health score. We rate your daily mood and feelings to generate a
score averaged over a period of time, that tells how well you are keeping. Stay
elevated, keep a high score. Also, have a look at your top feelings, moods and

comments: I payed for a month just to try it out fully. It's a very pleasing app to use, the ui looks very elegant and it actually feels like Chiku is asking me questions rather than me just ranting onto the paper. The o ly complaints I have are that it's going to be a massive pain to scroll to old stories and I feel as though the daily reads (for me) aren't too useful. Really great app! I'm considering buying the lifetime plan hoping this app doesn't get discontinued.

Very nice app. It's more than an app. It's a safe spaceüåå. Meditation is very nice. The quotes are very good of course!! Im in love with this app. The themes are all so good. Writing here is so easy!! Love it.
Easiest app to use. It is enough options to declare all your feelings and mood conditions, also, if you want you can add a written description about what's going on.
This app is amazing. I love how it reminds you to add a new story every day. Idk how to explain but everything is perfect.

I'd like to visit my previous entries with more ease. Please let me view them more easily without having to scroll sideways a lot. Also a go-to feature where you can find specific entries besides the filter would help. Also it would be nice to be able to save community blogs and daily quotes that inspired you. Maybe save them somewhere so you can access them any time. I also have experienced difficulty downloading the pdf versions of my entries.

title: OPIT - Overdose Prevention & Intervention Toolkit
description:
Overdose Prevention and Intervention Toolkit (OPIT) aims to reduce the risk of opioid related overdose deaths through education, awareness, self assessment, & resources. OPIT provides a self assessment tool for those struggling with opioid use to gain awareness about the risks associated with the use of opioids.  

The app also provides education and myth busters around opioid use and Opioid Use Disorder. There is information about Naloxone, including how to use it and how to obtain the life-saving medication. Other useful components of the app include: 
     - How to recognize and respond to an overdose
     - The ability to connect directly with a crisis hotline
     - How to access important resources for opioid users and their loved ones

OPIT was developed by the Grassroots Crisis Intervention Center located in Howard County, Maryland in partnership with NextLOGiK. Grassroots provides supportive and professional  24-hour crisis intervention, suicide prevention, shelter, and outreach services to individuals and families experiencing a personal, situational, mental health, or shelter crisis.

title: Forgotten Hill: Surgery
description:
Can you escape the horrors of the Surgery Clinic?
You wake up in a cold and creepy room, with just some vague memories of the horrors you faced, but you know you have to escape from the Surgery Clinic of Colonel McMillan...
Face a new adventure in the third chapter of Forgotten Hill series, meet new weird characters, solve puzzles and riddles to find a way to escape and gather new informations on the story of Forgotten Hill. Will you survive?

Download Forgotten Hill: Surgery now, you will find:

- creepy atmosphere with unique graphic style
- challenging and original puzzles
- strange mysterious characters
- new pieces to understand the puzzling story of Forgotten Hill
- sequel of the popular Forgotten Hill: Puppeteer
- completely translated into in 9 languages: english, spanish, portoguese, french, german, italian, russian, korean and japanese
- Completely Free, no hidden fees, no in app purchase, no registration, simply install, play and escape!

Check out www.forgotten-hill.com for more secrets about Forgotten Hill.

This one was very enjoyable. The only complaint I have is that it took me forever to realize how to move the clock hands the correct way, but that was more on me than the game itself :) Short, but not too short. The puzzles take a bit of effort, but aren't overly complicated, either.
