recentChanges:
Thank you for all your patience and support! We have improved our app‚Äôs performance and made it bilingual (French and English).
Switch the language of your device to French if you want to use MindShift in French.
comments: A good app for very basic, grounded challenges people with simple lives might face. It's very lacking, however, when it comes to greater, more complex, interconnected challenges. At its core it assumes changing thinking or taking certain action will improve things, but that isn't always true. It's for mainstream issues. If you have some self-mastery, you'll need a better app, or this one will need upgrading. Many of the default options only scratch the surface. Great for teenagers/young adults.
This apps discusses the social anxiety disorder in great depth. It really works!
Unable to get anywhere.. the App won't download ~ this is worsening my anxiety.

This app is helpful for anyone because everyone gets anxious and often don't know how to deal with it well. This app gives you the tools to do that. You can label how you feel, explain why you feel that way, learn ways to reframe your thoughts using the coping cards and so much more. I haven't been using this for long, but I have a feeling this will change your life for the better if you using it regularly and take advantage of the resources on this app.

It started well, but today I faced the same issue as others: my checkins and experiences were removed 4 days in the past, and I only made summaries once a day. That was the most useful feature for me. Bummer.

title: Narcissism Explained the truth about NPD
description:
Narcissism Explained is a comprehensive educational psychology app which explains in a detailed manner the concept of narcissism, malignant narcissism, covert narcissism, and the psychiatric condition known as NPD or narcissistic personality disorder. The developer relies both on his own knowledge and experiences dealing with narcissism and narcissists and on the expertise of a host of psychologists and psychiatrists.  The American Psychiatric Association is also used as a primary reference in the app.  The developer makes a point to distinguish the psychiatric disorder known as NPD from the personality trait of narcissism. 

The origin of the term narcissist is explained in detail by way of the ancient Greek myth of Narcissus.  The app also includes plenty of attractive photographs depicting the theme of narcissism.

Narcissism is discussed both in terms of being a personality trait and as a diagnosable psychiatric disorder. The American Psychiatric Association‚Äôs diagnostic criteria for narcissistic personality disorder are outlined along with other negative or toxic behaviors that are common among narcissists. 

This app includes a mixture of original articles written by Psycnet staff based on research and personal experiences.  It also includes articles written by some of the leading experts in the field of psychology and in the area of narcissism.  The result is a good mix of information on narcissism and the more serious disorder known as NPD or narcissistic personality disorder.

This app includes:

‚Ä¢	An introduction to the topic of Narcissism
‚Ä¢	The ancient myth of Narcissus
‚Ä¢	A detailed explanation and description of Pathological Narcissism
‚Ä¢	A discussion of the Causes of Narcissism
‚Ä¢	A description of the Malignant Narcissist
‚Ä¢	A description of Covert Narcissism
‚Ä¢	Twelve Lies Narcissists Tell
‚Ä¢	Famous Narcissists in History
‚Ä¢	Tips for Spotting a Narcissist
‚Ä¢       Ways Narcissists Try to Silence you in Arguments. 
‚Ä¢       Diversion Tactics Narcissists Use.
‚Ä¢       Signs You‚Äôre the Victim of Narcissistic Abuse
‚Ä¢       Terrifying ways Narcissists will provoke you
‚Ä¢       An online self-assessment for NPD
‚Ä¢	An online self-assessment for narcissistic traits
‚Ä¢	An online 20 question TEST on the subject of Narcissism

And much more!

If you have comments or questions regarding the app feel free to contact us at psycnetsolutions@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Narcissism Explained is a comprehensive educational psychology app which explains in a detailed manner the concept of narcissism, malignant narcissism, covert narcissism, and the psychiatric condition known as NPD or narcissistic personality disorder. The developer relies both on his own knowledge and experiences dealing with narcissism and narcissists and on the expertise of a host of psychologists and psychiatrists. The American Psychiatric Association is also used as a primary reference in the app. The developer makes a point to distinguish the psychiatric disorder known as NPD from the personality trait of narcissism.

The origin of the term narcissist is explained in detail by way of the ancient Greek myth of Narcissus. The app also includes plenty of attractive photographs depicting the theme of narcissism.

Narcissism is discussed both in terms of being a personality trait and as a diagnosable psychiatric disorder. The American Psychiatric Association‚Äôs diagnostic criteria for narcissistic personality disorder are outlined along with other negative or toxic behaviors that are common among narcissists.

This app includes a mixture of original articles written by Psycnet staff based on research and personal experiences. It also includes articles written by some of the leading experts in the field of psychology and in the area of narcissism. The result is a good mix of information on narcissism and the more serious disorder known as NPD or narcissistic personality disorder.

This app includes:

‚Ä¢ An introduction to the topic of Narcissism
‚Ä¢ The ancient myth of Narcissus
‚Ä¢ A detailed explanation and description of Pathological Narcissism
‚Ä¢ A discussion of the Causes of Narcissism
‚Ä¢ A description of the Malignant Narcissist
‚Ä¢ A description of Covert Narcissism
‚Ä¢ Twelve Lies Narcissists Tell
‚Ä¢ Famous Narcissists in History
‚Ä¢ Tips for Spotting a Narcissist
‚Ä¢ Ways Narcissists Try to Silence you in Arguments.
‚Ä¢ Diversion Tactics Narcissists Use.
‚Ä¢ Signs You‚Äôre the Victim of Narcissistic Abuse
‚Ä¢ Terrifying ways Narcissists will provoke you
‚Ä¢ An online self-assessment for NPD
‚Ä¢ An online self-assessment for narcissistic traits
‚Ä¢ An online 20 question TEST on the subject of Narcissism

And much more!

If you have comments or questions regarding the app feel free to contact us at psycnetsolutions@gmail.com
summary: Narcissism Explained is a psychology app about narcissism, narcissists, and NPD
recentChanges: App Privacy Policy added
comments: I loved this app! Having been raised by a covert narcissist (which I didn't learn till I was 54yo) I was a "hot mess" to say the least! After my therapy, I seemed information & was quickly confused, emotion, & angry. This app helped me to read without so much clinical verbiage, which was easier to fill me my need to read about narcissism without all the clinical diagnostics. Thank you for developing such a useful tool!
This app has loads of information on this disorder. It's very informative and can help you understand it even more.Thanks app creator.
pretty good app, should change pronouns, it assumes all narcissists are male, when it's close to 50/50
This App is a LIFE-CHANGING resource. It is truly very helpful in dealing with this torrid temperament
I found this app very informative and would recommend it to anyone that wants to learn more about narcissism.

title: Unhappy Wallpapers
description:
Unhappy wallpapers will reflect your true mood, no matter how dark it may be!

Why pretend that everything is cheerful and full of roses when inside you just want to scream and cry? If you're feeling sad, lonely and depressed, the last thing you want is some bubbly, colorful wallpaper mocking you every time you look at your phone! With these cynical and somber wallpapers, your background will finally match your mood.

Some people are naturally happy, while others are weighed down by the pain and sorrow of the world. If you are one of the people more in touch with the dark side of your emotions, you'll definitely relate to these honest sayings. Void of colors, like your heart is void of feelings, these black and white wallpapers feature painfully realistic sayings that reflect your true thoughts. Use these wallpapers to express yourself even when you feel like you can‚Äôt express yourself in any other way. Perhaps a stranger next to you will notice your background and understand your pain...

Break the silence on your hopelessness and depression by speaking up in a small way by using background that reflects your inner misery and despair. No one can stop your tears and pain, but at least these wallpapers won‚Äôt try to cover up what‚Äôs truly in your heart!

recentChanges: Updated for an improved user experience.
comments: I really like this app. It patches part of the hole in my heart because I can relate to these so well. Before I couldn't even put my depressing thoughts into words, but this app helped. I also needed something other than the optimistic junk my phone produces... Finally something to match my sad soul. Thank you, Leafgreen! I change the wallpapers everyday!

They were all the same things, and were really boring. I found the exact same stuff on Google images, screenshotted them, and cropped the photo. There really is no point with this wallpaper app. But they were really relatable to me. Since I think I'm anonymous, I'll just say it. I have depression, I have anger issues, I have social anxiety, and I'm bipolar. These pretty much explain everything -Hope this helps

too few pictures, I want more than just 25-30 pictures per app, can't you app-makers make more of an effort on both quality AND quantity, sure the pictures in this app are quite good but there are too few. "Goth Wallpapers" had the same problem, great pictures but less than 100 of them.

This app is great. All the days when you just wanted to be alone and cry but yiu checked your phone and positivity just screamed at you, those days were annoying but now you have this. I reccomend to everyone who has the same feeling as I do.

This apps message is strange, but the process is simple and easy to do. There are too many ads and not that much wallpapers to choice from. Unhappy wallpapers also provokes young children to have suicide thoughts and make them believe they have depression. I do enjoy how it shows other wallpaper apps if you're looking for different themes.

title: The Wonder Weeks vs 9
description:
"The Wonder Weeks app can be a lifesaver for parents during those times of wondering what on earth is going on."

A CALENDAR EXPLAINING THE DEVELOPMENT OF YOUR BABY: WHY YOUR BABY IS FUSSY, SLEEPS POOR AND EATS LESS DURING SET TIMES AND HOW YOU CAN HELP YOUR BABY.

================================================
THE BEST APP AROUND THE GLOBE

‚Ä¢	Awarded Coolest App for Moms
‚Ä¢	Awarded by Apple as top 10 ‚ÄòBest of the year 2016‚Äô in Australia, UK, Netherlands, and a great number of other countries.
‚Ä¢	Consumer Choice & Gold Award by MumIi 
‚Ä¢	AppRx Awards Top 10 Children‚Äôs Health App
‚Ä¢	NHS (UK) ‚Äì Best App for parents listing.
‚Ä¢	Best App Ever Wards 2013 & 2014 (Health & Fitness) 
‚Ä¢	Top 25 App in health & fitness is most countries around the world.
================================================

The Wonder Weeks worldwide bestselling baby app is a personalised daily calendar of your baby‚Äôs development that will keep you informed about the (mental) leaps and bounds and the fussy phases of your baby -- any time of day or night. This baby calendar app won prizes in several countries as BEST PARENTING APP!‚Ä® ‚Ä®‚Ä®

Think of it as a portable, at-a-glance version of the calendar leap chart in The Wonder Weeks. Where the book describes in-depth and easy-to-understand terms the incredible developmental changes your baby goes through, the app is the perfect leap calendar companion to track your baby‚Äôs mental development (during the first 20 months).‚Ä®By knowing what is going on inside the head of your baby, you can help him to make the leap more easily and stimulate his development. 

The Wonder Weeks app helps new parents by:‚Ä® ‚Ä®
- Calendar Showing when your baby makes a leap in his mental development‚Ä®
- What your baby can understand & learn after this mental leap‚Ä® 
- What your baby can do after this leap‚Ä® 
- What you can do to help your baby‚Ä® ‚Ä®

This app is also a handy reminder for new parents when their baby‚Äôs brain is changing, or ‚Äúleaping,‚Äù the baby is making a significant advance in mental development, and with each step forward comes a drastic change in the way your baby sees the world around him. Because these leaps come so quickly, the ‚Äúnew world‚Äù and new abilities can sometimes be scary, and the development can initially manifest in poor sleep, bad appetite, crying, clinging and crankiness ‚Äì exhausting and frustrating mom and dad.‚Ä®

Disclaimer:‚Ä® ‚Ä®This App is developed with the greatest care. Neither the developer nor the author shall nevertheless be liable for any damages arising from any inaccuracies or omissions in this app.


Please send your feedback, comments or complaints to:
support.android@thewonderweeks.com

recentChanges:
Added Arabic and Korean languages
Added FAQ in profile menu
Restyled profile menu
comments: Pretty good but room for improvement For parts of the app it's strange the way it's written for the checklists ie, "you suck your thumb more, you cry more", I'm not doing this, my child is! And other times it refers to the child by its name (kinda random) . Subscription service is pretty strange too, just look at it!! It cracks me up. Great app over all though! Worth about 4 bucks in my opinion. I'd get it as it's full of fantastic recourses.

This book/ app is so helpful with keeping your head on straight during the leaps. I found it very helpful to know why my daughter was all of a sudden less smiley and sleeping worse. It was equally helpful to know when it would end. As a first time parent, I use the leap-appropriate games and activities suggestions often- helps to appreciate the wonder of her learning curve. Love this and can't suggest it more highly.

Very confusing to navigate, non Intuitive, and has grammar issues. Text heavy. not worth $5. Seems like every time your kid is fussy the answer is mental leap. Might as well Google growth spurts and child development and get simpler and quicker explanations of what's happening.

Terrible layout, confusing information. The app says in one spot we're in the middle of a developmental leap, and another spot says it won't be starting for two more weeks. It's hard to navigate to find the information you're looking for. I don't recommend.

Very disappointed that I paid for this. Its so confusing and I'm not getting anything from it at all. My baby doesn't follow any of the "leaps" and the signs make me anxious that I should expect things that never happen. I'll be deleting and just going with the flow.

title: 211 Info
description:
Are you in need of health or social services but don‚Äôt know where to turn? If you live in Oregon or Southwest Washington, the 211info app is a free and easy way to locate and get connected to thousands of resources that help. Enable locations services on your phone and let the 211info app guide you to resources located near you, whether it be for temporary housing, food pantries, foster youth resources, suicide prevention, legal assistance, parenting programs and much more.

211info has been operating in Oregon since 2004, and every year more than 425,000 contact us by dialing 211, texting their zip code to 898211 or searching on 211info.org ‚Äì all free and confidential. We also have bilingual staff who can assist people in English and Spanish, and all our staff have access to a translation service with more than 140 languages. Keeping people and communities healthy means more than access to medical care. It means ensuring people have access to the basics, like food, housing and job opportunities. 211info is committed to working towards an Oregon and Southwest Washington where everyone‚Äôs health and social services needs are met.

Use this app to locate health and social services on the go. Capabilities include:

+ Easy to use navigation
+ Geo location enabled
+ Results viewed either in map or list form
+ Detailed program information, including address, phone, hours of operation, web address, eligibility requirements and more
+ One-touch connection to the 211info call center for more information either by phone, text or email

comments: Quite a few problems with this app: the biggest one being that the description of the app says nothing about this being an app for Oregon State only. Other issues being: 1) clicking on the left hand corner icon (three horizontal lines) doesn't fully transition you to the sub-menu so you're stuck halfway between the main and sub menu. 2) the data provided is only partially human readable and clearly is coming from a database. App needs a major overhaul.
It's a good idea, except its nonfunctional. It only showed resources for a very small portion of your categories and they were across the nation, making it still useless.
Worked a few months ago, doesn't seem to work on my goverment phone but will work on my GFS iPhone 6. Hopefully it catches up with the goverment phone capability. . .
fantastic app, fantastic resource. something that is very much a necessity in Portland.
There's a 211 Office in my town but this app cant find anything in ALL of the catagories.

title: Stanley-Brown Safety Plan
description:
WHAT IS A SAFETY PLAN?
A safety plan is a list of coping strategies and social supports that people can use when they are in a suicidal crisis or very distressed. It helps them not act on their suicidal feelings. The plan is brief, is in the individuals‚Äô own words, and is easy to read. It is an emergency plan for suicide crises.

WHO SHOULD HAVE A SAFETY PLAN?
Anyone who gets suicidal and wants help feeling better and less suicidal.

Clinicians can collaborate with individuals to develop the safety plan. Individuals can also develop plans on their own.

IMPLEMENTING THE SAFETY PLAN
There are 6 Steps involved in the development of a Safety Plan.

Step 1: Warning Signs 
List warning signs of a suicide crisis. Include specific thoughts, images, thinking processes, mood, and/or behaviors

Step 2: Internal Coping Strategies
List activities that can be done without anyone else involved to cope and distract from suicidal thoughts, e.g. going online, listening to calming music, talking a walk, watching television.

Step 3: Social Contacts and Social Settings That May Distract from the Crisis
List individuals and safe social settings that can distract and support the individual. Discussion of suicidal feelings are not included here.

Step 4: Family Members or Friends Who May Offer Help
List family members and/or friends who can help with the suicidal crisis. Discussion of suicidal feelings can be included here.

Step 5: Professionals and Agencies to Contact for Help
List important health professionals, local ER, crisis line number

Step 6: Making the Environment Safe
Identify how to restrict/remove access to lethal means.

WHAT ARE THE STEPS AFTER THE PLAN IS DEVELOPED?

ASSESS the likelihood that the overall safety plan will be used.
Problem solve to identify barriers or obstacles to using the plan. Determine how to eliminate them.
REVIEW the plan periodically to determine whether the plan needs to be revised.


The Safety Plan app was developed with permission from Stanley & Brown (2012). Developers: Barbara Stanley, Gregory K. Brown, and Padraic Doyle. New York State Office of Mental Health.

title: De-StressMe: CBT Tools to Manage Stress
description:
De-StressMe brings personalized Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care tools to your phone. Now you can manage stress, get stress relief, and improve mental health with the click of a button. And it's free!

De-StressMe has 3 primary features: 

1) Education about Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care. Every day for 31 days at a time you choose, you will receive a brief, 10 second lesson. Each lesson is designed to be quick and easy to understand allowing you to reflect on the lesson the rest of the day. These lessons also teach you how to use the app more effectively.

2) Stress management and preparation for future stressful situations. You can set self-care goals, reflect on personal strengths, count the positives in your life, write about your day in a Mood Diary, and create coping cards to keep yourself centered and balanced. 

3) Stress relief when you need it most. Just click the De-StressMe button and the statements you wrote to manage stress and the questions you answered in the tutorial get transformed and used for relaxation, stress relief, and improved mental health.

Free features include:
‚Ä¢ Personalized Cognitive Behavioral Therapy tools to manage stress. Includes over 12 different CBT techniques to center you when you need it most such as distress scales, credit lists, deep breathing and relaxation, imagery techniques, self-care goals, and more.
‚Ä¢ 31 high-impact, ten second lessons for learning self-care, coping skills, relaxation techniques, and CBT theories.
‚Ä¢ Sections for writing self-care ideas, things you are thankful for, personal strengths and coping cards to keep you centered. These entries are also used to improve the de-stressing tool‚Äôs effectiveness to maximize stress relief.
‚Ä¢ A mood diary for journaling about your day and mood.
‚Ä¢ Reminders to attend to self-care, social supports, and emotional wellness.
‚Ä¢ Password entry for your diary with a back-up security question to keep your information secure from prying eyes.
‚Ä¢ Suicide hotline number for calling and texting at high stress levels.
‚Ä¢ All of your information stays on your phone. De-StressMe does not take data from your phone.
‚Ä¢ And most importantly, no Ads! So nothing interferes with you getting your stress relief when you need it. 

For a limited time, premium features included free: 
‚Ä¢ 10+ bonus 10 second lessons based on Acceptance Commitment Therapy.
‚Ä¢ Over 35 pre-filled coping cards to help you cope with difficult situations such as problems at work, keeping boundaries around toxic people, and difficult changes in life.
‚Ä¢ Over 100 self-care ideas based on embracing your creativity, relaxing, being active, and being social.
‚Ä¢ Over 100 statements for giving thanks ranging from simple things to grandiose statements about life and success.
‚Ä¢ Over 100 individual strength ideas, inherent and physical strengths.
‚Ä¢ The ability to favorite and edit these coping cards, self-care ideas, personal strengths, and affirmations of thanks. This dramatically cuts down on the time you spend typing.

Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) has been found to be one of the most effective therapies to manage stress, strengthen coping skills, and improve mental health in a myriad of medical and psychological studies. However, therapy is expensive and there are often few options for good therapists in many parts of the world. De-StressMe makes therapy skills available to everyone. 

Your feedback is great for helping us achieve our goal of helping the most people. Please rate, comment, and share.

This app should not be used to replace therapy or medication for people with untreated or uncontrolled mental illness. It is not a medical treatment.

De-StressMe provides simple Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and self-care tools for managing stress, stress relief, and improving mental health.

https://www.facebook.com/DeStressM3/

summary: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) tools to manage stress and mental health.
recentChanges: Badges section updated.
comments: This has been a great app, it's especially useful when you're having an anxiety attack and you can't help yourself or have anyone to go to. Even if things escalate (suicidal ideation, self-harm etc) it still provides help and resources.

I have a VERY HIGH stress level.This app helps with calming my anxiety,looking at things in a more positive light,and is just THE BEST all around app that is FREE and HELPFUL.TRY IT-you'll love it,too!!!

De-stress Me is a mental well-being app based on cognitive-behavioral (CBT) techniques. I am currently a graduate student in psychology, and as such, I used this app with a discerning eye. The first time I opened the app I was greeted by a rather minimal interface with several options on the bottom of the screen, and a big de-stressMe button in the center. The options along the bottom allow you to input information including your strengths, ways to give thanks, and self-care ideas. The information that you input is used when you activate the de-stressing tool. One of the primary components of CBT is cognitive restructuring which entails challenging negative and automatic thoughts. The app cleverly integrates the information that you input into the bottom menus in order to assist you in challenging negatively oriented thoughts that you may experience during times of stress. Additionally, the app may suggest a technique that I am familiar with from my training, diaphragmatic breathing. The app does a good job of teaching and applying the basic tenants of both strategies. Overall, the app was helpful in reducing my stress and is based on sound psychological principles. I would recommend this app to anyone looking for a convenient and cost-effective way to reduce stress in their life.
Lovely, well designed and effective app. A must for those prone to stress and anxiety. Particularly love the images of progressing up a mountain in de-stress mode.
This app is really helping me! It seems simple but is highly effective the more a person practices with it. I'm glad this app is available and is free!

title: CDC Milestone Tracker
description:
Milestones matter! Track your child‚Äôs milestones at key developmental stages from 2 months to 5 years with CDC‚Äôs easy-to-use illustrated checklists; get tips from CDC for encouraging your child‚Äôs development; and find out what to do if you are ever concerned about how your child is developing.

From birth to age 5, your child should reach milestones in how he or she plays, learns, speaks, acts and moves. Photos and videos in this app illustrate each milestone and make tracking them for your child easy and fun!

Features:

‚Ä¢         Add a Child -- enter personalized information about your child or multiple children
‚Ä¢         Milestone Tracker -- track your child‚Äôs developmental progress by looking for important milestones using an interactive, illustrated checklist
‚Ä¢         Milestone Photos and Videos -- know what each milestone looks like so that you can better identify them in your own child
‚Ä¢         Tips and Activities -- support your child‚Äôs development at every age
‚Ä¢         When to Act Early ‚Äì know when it‚Äôs time to ‚Äúact early‚Äù and talk with your child‚Äôs doctor about developmental concerns
‚Ä¢         Appointments -- keep track of your child‚Äôs doctors‚Äô appointments and get reminders about recommended developmental screenings
‚Ä¢         Milestone Results ‚Äì get a summary of your child‚Äôs milestones to view, and share with or email to your child‚Äôs doctor and other important care providers  

For more information and free tools to help you track your child‚Äôs milestones, visit www.cdc.gov/ActEarly.

This app was developed by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention‚Äôs ‚ÄúLearn the Signs. Act Early.‚Äù program with contribution from Dr. Rosa Arriaga and students from the Computing for Good program at the Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA.  

The use of this app is not a substitute for the use of validated, standardized developmental screening tools as recommended by the American Academy of Pediatrics.

CDC does not collect or share any personal information that can be used to identify you or your child.

developer: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Updated API level
comments: Someone needs to proofread this app as there are a number of glaring typos,and it makes me hesitant to get medical advice when the app so clearly has not been properly reviewed.
Why is the YouTube app required for this to work now? It used to work fine. Please change back!

This app is fine for typically developing kids. I wish there were places to indicate special needs and modified developmental needs. To my knowledge, there aren't alternative developmental milestone charts even available. Which is really frustrating, for example of course my blind child is not pointing at pictures of the animals in books. But, there's no alternative Milestone checklist available for her. So, this really wasn't very useful for our family as most of our children have special needs
Great app for tracking my child's developmental processes!
Short explanations and the checklists remind new moms when to help a child practice new skills, like using spoons.

‚Ä¢ Bug fixing and improvements
‚òÖ New feature: Backup/Restore in Google Drive, OneDrive and DropBox
comments: Whenever is start feeling tempted all I have to do is look at my home screen... 6 days... Don't wanna throw that all away. It's super helpful and and incouraging. I don't even know if it has adds because I use it as I need and see none. Easy to use, too.

This app is really helping. I am using this while trying to stop cutting and it is very reassuring to see that number go up. I am currently at 2 days without cutting and this app is really encouraging me to continue being strong and not give in.
Nice app which does the job perfectly and doesn't come up with notification or creepy advertisements
I once set a goal to set a goal. This app was way more useful than I expected
Good. Simple. Works. On home screen and also notifies you when you've hit a certain number of days. You can only run one timer at a time with the free version.

title: Depression Test
description:
This depression test uses PHQ-9 questionnaire to evaluate your depression. 

Depression Test will ask you 9 simple questions and you will have to answer those questions by selecting most relevant answer. 

A depression test will help you find out if you need medical attention or not. 

If your score is higher, you should see a professional physician. 

DISCLAIMER: This self-test Depression test doesn't meant to be a diagnosis for your depression. This app cannot replace the services provided by the doctor / physicians.

To much ads i comes 5 - 10 ads every time and I hate it
Very useful app
I've tried a bunch of tests and their all the same
I kept on getting interrupted

title: Ten Percent Happier - Meditation & Sleep
description:
Want to sleep better, be more mindful, improve your relationships, and become just about ten percent happier? This is the app for you. Our guided meditations, videos, talks, and sleep content will help you build (or boost) your meditation practice, and stick with it.

WHAT‚ÄôS INSIDE:

- Video and meditation combos that make it fun and straightforward to learn to meditate.
- A library of 500+ guided meditations on topics ranging from anxiety to parenting to focus, ensuring that you can find exactly the right meditation for the moment.
- A sleep section filled with relaxing meditations that make it easy to fall (and stay) asleep.
- Bite-size stories, wisdom, and inspiration that you can listen to while on the go - for those moments when you‚Äôre not feeling like meditation but want some mindfulness.
- New content released weekly to keep meditation from becoming a chore.
- Quick meditations that fit into your busy life‚Äîduring your commute, lunch break, etc.

PRESS: 

** #1 Top listed app in New York Times ‚ÄòHow to Meditate‚Äô guide

** Featured for ‚Äòemergency election stress‚Äô meditations in The Washington Post

** Launched on ABC‚Äôs Good Morning America


--------------

About the 10% Happier book:

In his #1 New York Times bestseller, 10% Happier, ABC news anchor Dan Harris explores how his on-air panic attack in 2004 prompted him to search for a way to defang the voice in his head. He found meditation, and it's helped him be less yanked around by his emotions.

--------------

About the 10% Happier podcast:

In his top-ranking podcast, Dan talks with smart people about whether there's anything beyond 10%. Can you be an ambitious person and still strive for enlightenment (whatever that means)? 

--------------

If you‚Äôre enjoying the app, please leave a review. It really helps! 

Questions/technical support? Please email us at support@tenpercent.com.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and other improvements.
comments: This app has been wonderful for reinforcing and growing my meditation practice. I've used other apps (calm for instance) and feel that this one has the least 'cynical drive for profit' behind its existence. My only complaint so far would be that the trial is a bit too short, and subscribing monthly would make it more appealing to skeptic beginners.

This app has been great in keeping me focused and on track. Great teachers and info. My only criticism is that, with the shortness of the meditations, some of the teachers talk so much throughout that it is hard to actually do my own practice. Sometimes i feel as though I'm being continually interupted.

The best meditation app imo. Less bells and whistles than Calm, but better guidance/instruction. Many different teachers cover a wide range of styles and techniques. This is definitely the app to choose if you want to deepen and expand your practice, but it would also be great if you're new to meditation too.

I loved the book and deeply appreciate a way to further my growth in meditation. I've only listened to three of the teachers so far but they are all excellent. I'm looking forward to medtation instead of feeling apprehensive. I have guides! Those who have been where I am now and are able and willing to share their wisdom and their support as I learn. I'm feeling kind of hopeful and not so very alone in a time when those feelings of hopelessness and loneliness might be having their way with me.

Learning meditation with this app has saved my sanity. As a health care provider during this pandemic, routine stress levels and difficulty balancing home and work skyrocketed. I was introduced to another Mindfulness program by psychiatrist friend, and soon after discovered Ten Percent Happier. The 2 complement each other. I enjoy hearing stories from Dan Harris about his own forays into meditation practice, happy to hear that it can be done even when thoughts can't be turned off completely.

title: üá∫üá∏Depression Test
description:
Up to 50% of all people in the USA suffer from depression at least once in their lifetime!
Do you feel tired? Powerless? Joyless? Empty? Depressed? Can't you sleep properly?
There is an explanation for all of this!
This interactive app was designed by professional US psychologists and aims to evaluate if you could possibly have a depression or not.
In the context of a simulated interview with a psychologist you receive questions that you can answer individually.
Depression is an officially approved disorder that is still tabooed and neglected by a big part of society, although depression is a widespread disease. Depression can be healed!
The earlier a depression is diagnosed, the faster you will feel better. This app has already helped many people!

comments: I just tried as it is made in India app how it works!! Its excellent as most of apps use personal information ask for subscription this will be helpful for people Stay mentally positive üëç

Excellent app! üëçüòÄ I have seen many patients with depression and I know that it is very difficult for them to talk with others about this topic. This app will open the eyes of many people who do not have the courage to talk to other people about their feelings and thoughts. This app will be the first step towards a better life for many. I would like to thank the developers of this app. You did a great job in making this important topic easily accessible with modern technology. Give it a try!üòÄ
I really like this app. It's very accurate and it kinda helped me reflect on myself. It's helping me get over my depression.
I like the idea about creating app. The patients can easier know their symptoms without fear or shyness of depression that they are suffered from.
This app is great, it's 4 stars cause it told me I'm in depression and I didn't want that but it is actually 5 stars

title: CBT Tools for Healthy Living, Self-help Mood Diary
description:
Mood log and analysis, CBT diary, healthy goals & more!

Feel hopeful about changing your life! Learn the cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) methods shown in psychological research to be effective in changing emotions/mood and behavior.

CBT tools included in this app
1) Cognitive Diary
‚Ä¢ step by step evaluation of an event that caused distress 
‚Ä¢ to help with cognitive restructuring

2) Inspire Diary
‚Ä¢ a simple diary method 
‚Ä¢ to provide affirmations and record positive events

3) Tests
‚Ä¢ to help you learn about yourself
‚Ä¢ Cognitive Styles Test, Your Happiness Assessment and more

4) Healthy Activities Log
‚Ä¢ track daily activities to motivate and make improvements

5) Mood Log 
‚Ä¢ record your moods throughout the day
‚Ä¢ mood analysis feature: shows your average mood ratings for different actions or events
‚Ä¢ graphs to track your mood

6) Points Log 
‚Ä¢ with encouraging messages
‚Ä¢ tracks progress and provides motivation
‚Ä¢ earn points to remove display ads for a week at a time

7) Daily Goals 
‚Ä¢ to plan your healthy activities
‚Ä¢ treatment planning with therapist

8) Links
‚Ä¢ to relaxation and assistance audios on the Excel At Life website

About cognitive-behavioral therapy
CBT Tools for Healthy Living by Excel At Life teaches you how to use the cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) methods in a simple format. The tools provided in this app are  derived from the CBT research base and developed into a user-friendly format by a psychologist with over 30 years of clinical experience.

Learn the CBT methods shown by decades of psychological research to be effective for changing your emotions/moods and behavior that contribute to depression, anxiety and stress, as well as problems in relationships, career and physical health.

These CBT methods can be used as self-help for minor issues or can be used in collaboration with your therapist to develop a treatment plan best suited to your situation. The Daily Goals feature can be used to record your plan and completed activities.

Other features
‚Ä¢ All personal data stored in your device.
‚Ä¢ Fully customizable: change the CBT terms (beliefs and definitions) used in the diary to conform with the system you are familiar with, add your own challenging statements for each belief, add moods/emotions, add healthy activities to track
‚Ä¢ Password protection (optional)
‚Ä¢ Daily reminder (optional)
‚Ä¢ Examples, tutorial, articles
‚Ä¢ Email entries and test results - useful for therapeutic collaboration
‚Ä¢ Remove ads by earning points or watching short ad video.

comments: This app is perfect. I've been searching for a while for something to help myself and use techniques that are forgotten if not kept at hand. I literally can't fault a single thing about it. THANK YOU!
Clean and user-friendly interface. Very useful if you want to write about your feelings, goals, experiences and personal development.

Amazing app. Full of features to help with negative thoughts, track your mood and set goals. Plus loads of info to help you learn more about CBT and yourself. I'd rate much higher than 5 stars if I could. When mental health services let me down I would credit this app with literally saving my life.
Sensible and practical CBT, helps you feel better about your efforts, and gives insight.

I recently came across this and I find it enjoyable and helpful. I'm not sure how I feel about the points yet, but it seems like a cool idea. I like that it has tests, organized set ups for different types of diary logs. It also gives you ideas and helpful tips. It makes it easier to decide how you're feeling and gauge how strongly you're feeling it. Lots of options and articles, and more! This is pretty cool, I'll be telling people about this app.

title: Emergency SOS Safety Alert ‚Äì Personal Alarm App
description:
Are you ever worried about your or your family‚Äôs safety? Does having peace of mind appeal to you? Do you have family that worry about your wellbeing? Our Emergency SOS alert app has been designed for you!

The Emergency SOS Safety Alert ‚Äì Personal Alarm App has been developed to help you quickly and simultaneously advise key people that you need urgent help, this can include family, friends, neighbours, colleagues or even medical staff ‚Äì whomever you nominate. You can add as many people to your alert system as you like! In fact, the more carers you nominate the greater chance you will have of getting the immediate response and help you need. Your contacts can then come directly to your aid, depending on their proximity or the situation, or they can contact emergency services on your behalf such as police, ambulance or fire services.
The app uses a mobile phone's GPS functionality and includes your location on a map, the time the emergency button was pressed, along with a pre-arranged tailored message to your message recipients. 

Make the most of this free service by telling those you care for about the app. We believe that everybody has the right to feel safe and we hope that our free emergency alert mobile app will help with that.

TOP TIP: Place your Emergency SOS Alert app on your home screen for quick access, giving you the ability to alert your SOS contacts in seconds.

KEY FEATURES
***************
1. When you are in distress, feel unsafe or in an emergency this app helps you alert multiple contacts with ONE simple press of a button 
2. The default emergency SOS alert message is sent to your contacts and includes a clear message advising them that you are in an emergency and require urgent help. 
3. You can easily adjust the default content of your emergency alert message to suit your needs.
4. You can add as many carers to your list who will simultaneously receive your emergency text message.
5. The emergency message includes your location on a map so they can see where you are.
6. Your carers are provided with the time the alert was activated and emergency message sent.
7. The message is sent within seconds (2 seconds of holding down the button).
8. Can be used across the globe as long as you are able to send text messages.
9. Track how many messages have been sent and when.
10. You can adjust your message and who received them at any time and as many times as you wish.
11. It‚Äôs free! So spread the news.

HELPING YOU FEEL SAFE WHOMEVER OR WHEREVER YOU ARE
*****************************************
The Emergency alert app is used by people of all ages, including children, teenagers, elderly, women and anyone who wants to feel safe and have peace of mind. 
The app can also be used in a variety of situations when you may need to ask for help or seek assistance from others. This could include potential assault, kidnapping, being lost, experiencing a serious health problem, feeling unsafe, being involved in an accident, and many more situations. Remember that although the default emergency alert message mentions that you are in an emergency and need urgent help, this message can be adjusted easily in the apps settings area.   

WHY OUR EMERGENCY SOS ALERT APP?
**************
Our very own families and loved ones rely on this same app. We have a vested interest in making sure that it works.  
We are not a one-man developer, managing our servers from a shed. We are a company that maintains our apps and monitors our servers. 
appCDM is proud to provide the global community with a free, helpful and effective alert app to help people of all nations and situations to feel safe. 

SUPPORT & FEEDBACK
******************
Email: support@careralert.com 
Website: careralert.com/sosalert
If you have any issues or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you.

https://careralert.com
************
Our Emergency SOS Safety Alert ‚Äì Personal Alarm App is also used by the dependant‚Äôs whose carers have the Carer Alert App installed.

This could include potential assault, kidnapping, being lost, experiencing a serious health problem, feeling unsafe, being involved in an accident, and many more situations. Remember that although the default emergency alert message mentions that you are in an emergency and need urgent help, this message can be adjusted easily in the apps settings area.

WHY OUR EMERGENCY SOS ALERT APP?
**************
Our very own families and loved ones rely on this same app. We have a vested interest in making sure that it works.
We are not a one-man developer, managing our servers from a shed. We are a company that maintains our apps and monitors our servers.
appCDM is proud to provide the global community with a free, helpful and effective alert app to help people of all nations and situations to feel safe.

SUPPORT & FEEDBACK
******************
Email: support@careralert.com
Website: careralert.com/sosalert
If you have any issues or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you.

https://careralert.com
************
Our Emergency SOS Safety Alert ‚Äì Personal Alarm App is also used by the dependant‚Äôs whose carers have the Carer Alert App installed.

So I can't even complete setup! I tried data only, wifi only & both on. I don't have any settings that would block the app, far as I know.

I opened it to test it and it froze, so I couldn't push it for help..I forced stop and turned my phone off and the button was still frozen when I opened it back up, so I uninstalled it and went for something else.
There was an issue that the developer fixed and this app now seems to work find and does exactly what it was intended to. Great to have on your phone if you are lost in the woods or get injured.

In case of emergency, profiles enable quick access to vital information such as your allergies, blood type, medical contacts, etc. that are essential to attending first responders, medics or medical staff having to take action.

comments: Nice app. Have used it for years now. Needed some as I have many heart issues. The only problem I have found is that responses list for organ donor. I not an organ donor do to the meds and health issues. The third option reads ( I refuse to donate my organs. ) there should be a response that reads simply, I am not an organ donor.

First of all, congrats on being featured in the Google Play Store. I just installed and so far it's a solid app. (BTW my background is in video game development so the bar is quite high.) The one section that caught my attention is [First aid techniques]. For example the: "call triple zero (000)" line makes sense since if you're in Australia, but it would add polish for users from other countries if you could use an auto detect (maybe IP?) to determine which country they're in, and swap out the text accordingly. Ditto for the CPR techniques. In the US the recommendation is now compression only CPR, so providing country specific instructions would be the icing on the cake! But all in all, solid, polished and well functioning app.

Having had this exelant app for a good time i have found a problem that i am unable to solve. I changed the lock screen banner to the middle of the screen , it now blocks the keypad numbers and i am unable to access the phone. I have been searching on google but, up till now, cannot find an answer. So beware of doing what i have done. Very easy to input health detail which would be critacle should I be taken I'll whilst away from home, it gave the option to be on the locked screen so that medics can know my problems, meds and contacts but without accessing my phone. Tried a couple, this was best by far.

I've only had this app two or three days, but suddenly I'm charging my phone about every eight (8) hours, instead of every two or three days!! This app draws way too much power from my battery, therefore I have to delete it. This makes me sorry, because I REALLY liked the way the app is set up and the info it contains.

I love the app for my phone! It's helpful to have in case I have a seizure (im epileptic) in public! The only problem I have is I recently got a smartwatch, and I don't think there's any compatibility with it. A little annoying that I can't have most of my information on me in case I forget my phone.

title: Dearly Departed Death a Day
description:
Death a Day Calendar

If you love Celebrity Death and useless trivia, this is your app.

Dearly Departed Death a Day Calendar is a light-hearted look at the Dark Side of Hollywood.  Famous and Infamous people die every day and this app will notify you of a well-known person who died on that day.

It‚Äôs a daily dose of celebrity death that provides factual details of where the particular person featured on that day was born, how and where they died and where they now permanently reside.  The Death a Day Calendar is peppered with odd facts of that particular individual.

Scott Michaels is the foremost expert on Celebrity Death.  As the owner of Dearly Departed Tours ‚Äì Hollywood‚Äôs Tragical History Tour (‚ÄúOne of LA‚Äôs Hidden Jewels‚Äù ‚Äì Dave Navarro), he has been featured on E! Hollywood Death Trip ‚Äì The 20 Most Horrifying Hollywood Murders, The Girls Next Door, and Ghost Adventures.  His website FindaDeath.com has entertained millions since 1998.

‚ÄúScott Michaels knows where the bodies are buried‚Äù ‚Äì Los Angeles Times

I learn alot about history through it (Hollywood stars, musicians, etc). Very respectful to people who have passed. Well done.
I like this app, part of my daily routine. I wish they had a way to report incorrect information because I have found some errors.
I love this app! Great info. Especially burial location
Everything is back to normal. Yippee! I love this app. I check it every day and so enjoy the bell at the beginning.

My daily go-to app! Its had a few glitches in the past (some lasting for months) but so far, it's been trouble-free. Love the daily trivia on the dead & famous (yes, I'm such a death hag!). I also love that some of the entries have YouTube links to see and hear more info about that person - thanks, Scott!!!

title: Mood Patterns - a mood tracker with privacy
description:
Overview
General Features
* usable as mood tracker and mood diary
* avoid recall bias with experience sampling
* as many surveys per day as you like
* 30 predefined mood scales
* 20 fully customizable scales
* customizable additionally data:
 - places
 - people
 - activities
 - sleep
 - events
* set alerts to be notified if your mood level or variation changes
* get associations between mood and additional data
* explore mood before and after event
* surveys can include notes
* markdown formatting of notes
* see data in beautiful, zoomable graphs
* export graphs
* export data 
* light and dark theme
Security Features
* NO internet connection
* App lock (with fingerprint)
* encryption of stored data
Note
Due to its many features Mood Patterns is NOT the simplest mood tracker. It probably will take you a few minutes until you know your way around the app. But we try our hardest to make it worth your while with helpful, detailed, and multifaceted insights. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to ask them at contact@moodpatterns.info or our FB page (link in the app).
 Details
Gain insights into your feelings
A mood journal or mood diary is a great way to keep a record of your feelings, but Mood Patterns can do much more for you. It is not just a mood tracker but links how you feel, to your location, company, and activity as well as to how you slept and to recent events in your life. Use it to explore the patterns in your mood.
Capture how you feel in your daily life
Classical diaries are great, but they have one major flaw - they are subject to recall bias. Some activities in our lives are more salient than others. We remember them better and more vividly and therefore often believe that they take a larger part of each day than they do. However, for most of us, routines fill the largest part of our daily life and those are often overlooked in diaries. 

To capture all parts of your life that matter Mood Patterns uses a technique of the social sciences: ecological momentary assessment also known as experience sampling. It never asks you to remember anything but records how you feel right at the moment. 
You are unique
Where we go, who we meet, and what we do is individual. With Mood Patterns, you do not have to choose from a fixed set of categories but can tailor your options to your personal needs. Be as nuanced as you like in configuring places, people, and activities.
Your data is yours
How you feel is sensitive private data. We believe it should not be carelessly entrusted to anybody. Mood Patterns  does not request Internet permission, therefore no data transfer in the background without your knowledge is possible. Mood Patterns will not send us or anybody else your data.

Nonetheless, we believe that you should have full access to the data you produce. You can export all collected data as a SQL database anytime you like.
Your data is safe
Denying Mood Patterns Internet access frees you from the need to trust us, but what about others? An app lock assures that only you can use your Mood Patterns app. To prevent that the app lock is bypassed  by connecting your mobile phone to a PC all data is 256-bit AES encrypted. Unfortunately, there is no 100% safety but Mood Patterns makes it hard to get your data without your consent.

Unfortunately, there is no 100% safety but Mood Patterns makes it hard to get your data without your consent.

comments: It's simple and cool. Autoprompting is my fav part Dev: Is there a way to customize the things that are surveyed? I'd like to use this to track my adhd symptoms throughout the day so being able to add my worst symptoms and then have like a high - low or 0 to 10, or having - not having, i could type it in myself depending on the symptom. Am I making any sense?

Excellent app, very good range of options and very stable. UI is intuitive, and accessible. Colour coding also helps to avoid being overly clinical, and feels nice to personalise it. The one thing I really, really wish it had was a one time purchase option for the pro version . I would happily pay more than the going rate to avoid a subscription model.

Finally, an app that lets you just track mood data on your phone without having to give anyone your email. Wonderful! This app is highly customizable, allowing you to track your mood, custom moods (for example, I added an uninspired vs creative slider), where you were, what you were doing, events that were happening. The dev is highly responsive- I emailed them about a bug and it was fixed in less than 24 hours. Couldn't ask for more!

Pretty good, love all the options for moods to track and sleep tracking, however the schedule function doesnt work so well. Im supposed to get notifications for a survery once every four hours but sometimes Ill go a full day without any notifications, or Ill be asked to take four surveys in the span of one hour

Very helpful to track and analyze mood and sleep patterns. Reminder alerts for surveys are so helpful! I'm still playing around with settings to customize, but decided paying for pro was definitely worth it. Thank you for adding the ability to back date a survey, 5 stars!

title: Depression - Mental Health Awareness
description:
Depression (major depressive disorder or clinical depression) is a common but serious mood disorder. It causes severe symptoms that affect how you feel, think, and handle daily activities.It is more than just feeling sad, upset or unmotivated from time to time, but depression is way more serious. 

It is a mood disorder characterized by prolonged feelings of sadness and loss of interest in daily activities. If these symptoms persist for a period of at least two weeks, it is considered you've diagnose with major depressive disorder.

Find out on what cause depression, the risk factor, sign & symptoms and the treatments and prevention step to be taken from it to re-occurring by download this essential mental health info awareness app!

App Features:
- 100% free to download.
- No In-app purchases needed.
- User friendly app navigation and design.
- Lightweight app design and required small storage space to install.
- Share function ready to spread this awareness among your friends and family trough your favorite social media app platform.

App Contain:
- Overview: Explaination & type of depression.
- Sign & Symptoms: Sign and Symptoms of what occur depression.
- Risk Factor: What major cause of this major depressive disorder
- Treatments: Treatments and prevention step for this mental health disorder.
- Great info-graphic included for more graphical information.

Remember, Prevention is better than cure. That is why it is essential for us gain awareness and deeper understanding on depression before it getting serious that potentially lead to suicide.
descriptionHTML:
Depression (major depressive disorder or clinical depression) is a common but serious mood disorder. It causes severe symptoms that affect how you feel, think, and handle daily activities.It is more than just feeling sad, upset or unmotivated from time to time, but depression is way more serious.

It is a mood disorder characterized by prolonged feelings of sadness and loss of interest in daily activities. If these symptoms persist for a period of at least two weeks, it is considered you've diagnose with major depressive disorder.

Find out on what cause depression, the risk factor, sign & symptoms and the treatments and prevention step to be taken from it to re-occurring by download this essential mental health info awareness app!

App Features:
- 100% free to download.
- No In-app purchases needed.
- User friendly app navigation and design.
- Lightweight app design and required small storage space to install.
- Share function ready to spread this awareness among your friends and family trough your favorite social media app platform.

App Contain:
- Overview: Explaination & type of depression.
- Sign & Symptoms: Sign and Symptoms of what occur depression.
- Risk Factor: What major cause of this major depressive disorder
- Treatments: Treatments and prevention step for this mental health disorder.
- Great info-graphic included for more graphical information.

Remember, Prevention is better than cure. That is why it is essential for us gain awareness and deeper understanding on depression before it getting serious that potentially lead to suicide.
summary: Understand more about what causes and symptoms of this serious mental disorder
comments: Very good and very informative app.

title: Mental Health Tanzania App
description:
Mental Health Tanzania App is a free Mental Health App that is available for everyone to download as, all rolled up into one and available to you anywhere anytime for your mental health,wellness & well-being. 

This app is a multidisciplinary team aiming at making  mental  health  services available at your  fingertips whereby all mental health professionals come in one place for you to access them anywhere anytime. 

The MHT App gives you  details about the  nearest  mental health  professionals ( multidisciplinary team)  such as Psychiatrist, Psychotherapist, psychologist, Counsellor, or social worker. You will  request a professional nearby you and meet for the  services. The App provides a Library of mental health  Professional and their Information about  services  they  provide

Upon downloading MHT App, you  will  be able to benefit from some of the following services we offer  from our  clinics and  our  professionals: Moreover, you will have opportunities to read mental health related articles and tips to keep your mind healthy. You will also, get more services such as: 


1. We provide psychological services such as counselling, psychotherapies, psychoeducation and consultations. 

 2. We ensure the psychological services by: 
‚éØ Diagnosing mental/ psychiatry disorders 
‚éØ Interventions to all psychological challenges, mental illnesses and assisting clients in recovering from their challenges.  
‚éØ Treatments-short and long treatment plans. 

 3. We develop short and long educational and Training Programs for:
‚éØ Skills development 
‚éØ Career development  
‚éØ Professional careers  

4. We develop Mental health programs such as:
‚éØ Community outreach programs
 ‚éØ Youth Support Groups Training programs

5. We form and develop multidisciplinary platform which brings psychologists, psychiatrists, counsellors and social workers to work as one team.

6. We provide Mental health awareness known as Mental Health Forum through radios, TVs, newspapers, magazines, seminars, symposiums, workshops, summits, meetings, conferences, social media, campaigns, artistic works, sport and games.  

MHT More Services:  
7.Chemical abuse & addiction: Our professional counsellors provide both individualized and group Consultation, Diagnostic Evaluation, Education, Counseling, Treatment and Supportive Services to adults, adolescents, concerned parents, and referral sources.  

8. Prevention measures & Public Psychoeducation: Our professionals also provide quality public education, personal growth and parenting workshops, professional training, and community psychoeducation program.

 9. Consultation, Counselling & Psychotherapy: Our professionals also provide quality public education, personal growth and parenting workshops, professional training, and community psychoeducation program consultations.

10. Mental Health Forum: This is Mental Health Dialogue, whereby our team are committed to provide professional open data and other facts about the promotion of mental health, prevention of mental illness, and how to promote awareness, early identification, access to treatment, crisis response, and recovery supports.  

11. Mental Health Research & Publications: Our professional team offers multiple research approach and investigation with an emphasis on prevention and early intervention at all stages of life.  

12. Short/Long Course Training Programs: We provide trainings in form of workshops, seminars or in days, weekly and monthly basis training courses for skills development, youth support groups, self-care, life coach, professional careers, career development etc. 

13. More programs may include: Mood & Thought Record Diary; Suicide Prevention; Alcohol Addiction Counselling; Substance Abuse Counselling; 

Download the App for the betterment of your mental health.

title: Breethe - Calm Meditation & Sleep Sounds
description:
Relaxing Sounds and Guided meditation to sleep better üò¥, breathe & be calm.  

De-stress, be happier & healthier with Breethe's Masterclasses on how to meditate, practice mindfulness,  and much more -  Recommended by People & InStyle. 
  
Can‚Äôt sleep? Choose from a wide variety of sleep sounds and relaxing melodies to help you get the restful sleep you need. You'll find premade sleep music playlists, nature sounds, guided meditations tracks, bedtime stories, hypnotherapy sessions and more. 

Deal with life‚Äôs challenges with guided meditation series, inspirational talks and masterclasses from mindfulness coach Lynne Goldberg  & New York Times best-selling personal growth experts. 

Main Features

¬•        Relaxation Music and Sleep Sounds   Hours of carefully selected nature melodies to help you relax, meditate, focus & sleep more soundly. 

¬•        Calm Music Playlists for various moods and occasions and the ability to create your own playlists. 

¬•        Bedtime Stories  and sleep meditations narrated to lull even the  most hardcore insomniacs into a night of deep sleep.

¬•        Bedtime Visualizations and guided imagery to absorb healing and positive messages while falling asleep.

¬•        Guided Meditations Hundreds of series for whatever you‚Äôre dealing with in your life and to get you into a calm headspace.

¬•        Alarm clock & morning meditations  to start your day on the right foot. 

¬•        Learn to Meditate with a 12-week daily program and progressively bring more calm and clarity into your life. 

¬•        Inspirational talks and masterclasses from some of the greatest personal growth teachers of our time to become more peaceful and help you enjoy your life better.

¬•        Hypnotherapy Sessions to help you tackle life‚Äôs challenges and to fall asleep easily for those who still have trouble sleeping. 

¬•        Breathing Exercises  and calming videos you can use to learn how to breathe deeper and calm down in a few minutes. 


¬•        Free version with lots of free meditations on many subjects for as long as you want, or unlock all content with a Premium Membership! 


Bring more happiness, and peace of mind into your life with soothing music, short meditations, calming videos and breathing exercises you can use anytime, anywhere.

comments: I love this app! It has so many different guided meditations to choose from. I love the music while I'm studying or reading. I did have a problem with the tracks cutting out, but customer service fixed this as soon as i asked so if you have a similar problem, don't assume it's the app. It was just the settings on my phone and super simple to fix. I am glad i bought the lifetime subscription. Hypnotherapy works well when I can't sleep and that is priceless!

Pretty wide variety of meditations and teachings. I really wanted to give feedback about their emails, I could not find anywhere else to write to someone. They are always in a very light grey font which no one over 50 could possibly read. I wish I could attach a picture because they will bold things which can be read perfectly, so about 6 to 10 words of the entire email are legible and the rest of the email is lost.
Not sure what all the negative reviews are about here.... This is by far the greatest app I have used for meditation and hypnotherapy! It saved my life! Thank you breathe!!!

Nice selection of tracks. The pay version seems WAY too pricey, so if never try it, but the free tracks are really nice. I use it only for going to sleep, but there are a lot of meditation options, too.

I haven't fully experienced the free version yet so this isn't a complete review but one thing i immediately noticed is that i can't cast audio to a Google device. I would recommend adding this feature in a future update.

title: Ritual: Wellbeing
description:
Ritual is a wellbeing app.

We‚Äôve studied wellbeing for over a decade, and we know it‚Äôs holistic: all the dimensions of your mental, emotional, spiritual, and social health. There are an incredible range of practices that can help to boost and sustain your wellbeing ‚Äî in secular, spiritual and religious forms.

At Ritual, we collaborate with renowned social scientists, spiritual leaders and cultural influencers to build those practices into guided audio experiences. Our practices include:

Journaling Practice with Alex Elle
Finding Meaning with Parker Palmer
Cultivating Compassion with Greg Boyle
Contemplative Prayer with Kathleen Cahalan
Embodied Spirituality with Barbara Brown Taylor
More and expanding every week

Practices work for you when they resonate with your identity and beliefs while meeting your unique wellbeing needs. At Ritual, we help you find the path that works for you.
Anyone can try out our practices for free, and Ritual subscribers get unlimited access to our growing library for $7.99/month.

Learn more about us at ritual.io
Read our Terms of Service here: ritual.io/terms-of-service
Read our Privacy Policy here: ritual.io/privacy-policy

comments: This app has been a necessary resource for me during these challenging times. It's encouraged me to be more present and compassionate towards my emotions. Highly recommend!!
Very clean interface and surprising diversity of wellbeing experts. Excited to make this part of my daily routine

Ritual:Wellbeing is the app that seems, providentially, to have been specifically designed for the turmoil pervading our world today. The app has offerings to help navigate the tumultuous currents we're all swimming in right now. And, I think, going forward it will help us as we try to decide what we want the next, new normal, to look like in our lives. I just started using it and already don't know how I did without it.

title: Symptomate ‚Äì Symptom checker
description:
What concerns you about your health today? Check your symptoms and find out what could be causing them. It's fast, free and anonymous.

Symptomate is the most advanced symptom checker that uses artificial intelligence to evaluate your symptoms. Developed and validated by doctors, Symptomate knows more than 700 conditions and will help you to check your health status instantly.


HOW IT WORKS

Enter symptoms
Symptomate will ask you to enter basic information about yourself and your symptoms. 

Answer a few questions
Symptomate will start looking for the cause of your symptoms. It will ask you a few carefully selected follow-up questions. 

Done! Check your results
Symptomate will analyze all your answers using advanced artificial intelligence technology. As a result, you will receive information on the following:
how serious your symptoms are
possible causes of your symptoms
actions to take
suggested lab tests


THE APP AT A GLANCE

AI-powered symptom checker
Learns and evolves every day
Verified by physicians and data scientists (34,000+ hours of review)
100,000+ assessments performed each month
700+ conditions and 1,300+ symptoms in the database
Available in many languages, including English, Spanish, Chinese, German, French, Portuguese, Arabic, Dutch, Czech, Turkish, Russian, Ukrainian, Polish and Slovak
No login required
... and more!


1,300+ SYMPTOMS

Ask Symptomate about:
Feeling weak, tired or sick
Headache
Abdominal pain
Nausea
Shortness of breath
Fever, sore throat, cough
Dizziness
Weight loss
Bloating
Back pain
Diarrhea
Chest pain
Dermatological changes, rash
... and many more


FEEDBACK 

Have you noticed a problem or have a suggestion? Drop us a line at support@infermedica.com. We‚Äôd love to hear from you!


LEGAL NOTICE

The Checkup is not a diagnosis. It is for informational purposes only and is not a qualified medical opinion.
Do not use in emergencies. In case of a health emergency, call your local emergency number immediately.
Your data is safe. The information you provide is anonymous and not shared with anyone.

comments: This app asks numerous questions relating to the symptoms that was given which gives more acurate suggestions. I even discussed the possible options with the doctor and he agreed that the suggestions made was very possible. This app is definitely the best one I have found thus far.
Amazing!!!...More accurate than Chris Kyle (The American Sniper)...hit my already diagnosed condition in less than 3 minutes..Took my doctor around 3 hours at his office...LOVE IT!!
Best AI health ever seen
This app is great works wellüëç

I've had issues with my gallbladder since having an IUD removed 2 1/2 yrs ago. Been having a lot of pain the last few days, checked my symptoms to confirm if it was my gallbladder again. Turns out I need that and my appendix removed as soon as a date can be set. The app found what a gastroenterologist, allergist, pcp, and other specialists couldnt for over a yr. Many unnecessary procedures later, I will finally be back on the path to being healthy and active again.

title: Sobriety Counter - Stop Drinking (EasyQuit)
description:
"EasyQuit" is a free app that will help you quit drinking immediately or by using a "quit drinking slowly" mode.
It has many motivational features such as the money you save, motivational health statistics about your body and how it improves without alcohol and personal motivations with a reminder function.


Motivational Health Section
‚òÖ Countdown timer to watch many aspects of your health improve as a result of your great decision to stop this bad habit.

‚òÖ See how much money you saved by not drinking and set a custom treat to buy from your savings.

‚òÖ Play a game of memory to distract yourself from the urge to have a drink.

‚òÖ "Quit Slowly" Mode with a customised plan and reminders to ease your body into quitting drinking.

‚òÖ Write your own personal motivations of why you want to stop drinking alcohol and let the app remind you of them daily.

‚òÖ 64 Beautiful Badges for your sobriety time and drinks passed; with congratulation reminders and sharing functionality.

‚òÖ 28 beautiful themes to personalise your experience.

‚òÖ High level of Privacy. No log in, no collection or selling of your sensitive data like email, password or contacts. Your data is saved locally on your phone.

‚òÖ Two awesome widgets to put on your home screen and always see the money you saved by quitting drinking and your time as an alcohol free person.


I hope my sobriety counter app helps you break this habit and stop drinking for good to become a sober healthy person for ever :)

recentChanges:
- added feature to export data to the professional version.
- updated libraries and privacy policy.
comments: I can't express how much this app has helped me! All the things it shows-from money saved to life added to the badges-they are all a great help! I especially love the notifocations when you hit a milestone. I'm on Day 9 and this app is a part of that success!

It's great and easy to use. It's not just a time tracker. It goes through the physical and mental effects from day one to 10 year. We know about hangovers and withdrawals...but do you know about cell regeneration or how long it take the neuron activity to take place? Interesting app. I wish it had an option for more reminders or different types (not just you've been sober now 100 hours...congratulations)

This app keeps track of not just how many days you're alcohol free, but potentially how much money you have saved. The positive benefits to your health. A little distraction game to get you through a hard moment, and a way to track triggers so "IF" you are trying to do deep dives into the WHY of your drinking habits. Totally a neat tool whether you are doing this on your own, with a therapist, or through an organized group.

Terrible app! Too many ads and you can't even use any of the sections such as how long since your last drink. This is supposed to motivate you into quitting slowly yet you can't even select sections such as how many days/ hours sober. Worthless! Uninstalling

Really, really wish the icons for the badges were each different from the last. Takes away from the satisfaction of achievement if they all look the same (for me at least). Otherwise, love the app and you can honestly use it to track any addiction tbh

title: Lonely Wallpaper
description:
No need to hide being lonely... let your wallpaper reflect your true feelings!

You are not alone in your loneliness! The sadness and isolation that you feel are echoed in the heartwrenching quotes featured in these wallpapers. Connect with quotes and sayings that reflect the true nature of the pain and loneliness in your heart. There is no reason to deny or hide your emotions; it is better to let them show and be open about the emptiness you feel. So be open and let your wallpaper be a testament to your inner suffering!

When you are feeling sad and lonely, the last thing you want is some cheesy cheerful wallpaper rubbing it in your face how miserable you feel. Instead, choose wallpapers that are made for when you are feeling lonely. These somber backgrounds won't try to cheer you up, instead they will give you permission to feel just the way you do. Loneliness and heartbreak are experienced by many people, as you'll see from all the quotes featured in these wallpapers. 

Whether you've just broken up with a boyfriend or girlfriend, or are chronically sad and alone, these wallpapers are made to match your mood.

comments: This app is very helpful! Before I moved in another school in 3rd grade, I was a happy but when I moved in another school I started to be more shy, to be more quiet and a bit sad that I lost my friends and i didn't had at that time my parents got divorced, it didnt affect me at that time I said that everything is going to be ok but in the last 4 months I started to not eat very much, to not sleep, to not talk to anyone just with my family...I just wanted to be alone! It makes me feel better!
This is a great app because I am lonely and I have been played serval times and this app is a telling me that there is people who go through the same things I do

This app is really cool. I am really depressed on the inside but none of my "friends" know because I have become a master at hiding my emotions and faking a constant silliness and smile when really I want to die. This app makes me realize that other people go through what I go through. I am too tired (depressed) to continue writing so goodbye.
